K02psp_5u:1075: prajñāpāramitābhinirhartavyā, pratītyasamutpādākṣayatvāt subhūte prajñāpāramitābhinirhartavyā, pratītyasamutpādāṅgākṣayatvāt subhūte prajñāpāramitābhinirhartavyā, dānapāramitākṣayatvāt subhūte prajñāpāramitābhinirhartavyā, evaṃ śīlapāramitākṣayatvāt kṣāntipāramitākṣayatvād vīryapāramitākṣayatvād dhyānapāramitākṣayatvāt
K02psp_5u:1077: smṛtyupasthānākṣayatvena samyakprahāṇākṣayatvena ṛddhipādākṣayatvena indriyākṣayatvena balākṣayatvena bodhyaṅgākṣayatvenāryāṣṭāṅgamārgākṣayatvena subhūte prajñāpāramitābhinirhartavyā, adhyātmaśūnyatākṣayatvena bahirdhāśūnyatāksyatvenādhyātmabahirdhāśūnyatākṣayatvena yāvad
K02psp_5u:1080: subhūte prajñāpāramitābhinirhartavyā śūnyatānimittāpraṇihitākṣayatvena pañcābhijñākṣayatvena subhūte prajñāpāramitābhinirhartavyā,
K02psp_5u:1081: sarvavimokṣasamādhisamāpattidhāraṇīmukhākṣayatvena subhūte prajñāpāramitābhinirhartavyā, daśabalākṣayatvena caturvaiśāradyākṣayatvena pratisaṃvidakṣayatvenāṣṭādaśāveṇikābuddha dharmākṣayatvena subhūte
K02psp_5u:1083: punar aparaṃ subhūte rūpākāśākṣayatvena bodhisattvena mahāsattvena
K02psp_5u:1085: mahāsattvena prajñāpāramitābhinirhartavyā, saṃjñākāśākṣayatvena subhūte bodhisattvena mahāsattvena
K02psp_5u:1088: mahāsattvena prajñāpāramitābhinirhartavyā, skandhākāśākṣayatvena subhūte bodhisattvena mahāsattvena prajñāpāramitābhinirhartavyā,
K02psp_5u:1091: mahāsattvena prajñāpāramitābhinirhartavyā, pratītyasamutpādākāśākṣayatvena subhūte bodhisattvena mahāsattvena prajñāpāramitābhinirhartavyā,
K02psp_5u:1094: mahāsattvena prajñāpāramitābhinirhartavyā, vijñānākāśākṣayatvena subhūte bodhisattvena mahāsattvena prajñāpāramitābhinirhartavyā,
K02psp_5u:1099: mahāsattvena prajñāpāramitābhinirhartavyā, tṛṣṇākāśākṣayatvena subhūte bodhisattvena mahāsattvena
K02psp_5u:1102: mahāsattvena prajñāpāramitābhinirhartavyā, jātyākāśākṣayatvena subhūte bodhisattvena (PSP_5:80) mahāsattvena prajñāpāramitābhinirhartavya,
K02psp_5u:1103: jarāmaraṇaśokaparidevaduḥkhadaurmanasyopāyāsākāśākṣayatvena subhūte bodhisattvena mahāsattvena prajñāpāramitābhinirhartavyā, iyaṃ subhūte bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya pratītyasamutpādavyavalokanā
K02psp_5u:1105: bodhimaṇḍaniṣaṇṇasya yad evaṃ pratītyasamutpādaṃ vyavalokayaty, evaṃ vyavalokayan pratītyasamutpādaṃ sarvajñajñānaṃ pratilapsyate. yaḥ kaścit subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvo 'nenākāśākṣayābhinirhāreṇa
K02psp_5u:1106: prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caran pratītyasamutpādaṃ vyavalokayiṣyati, na sa śrāvakabhūmau vā pratyekabuddhabhūmau vā patiṣyati, so 'nuttarāyāṃ
K02psp_5u:1107: samyaksaṃbodhau sthāsyati. yaḥ kaścit subhūte bodhisattvayānikaḥ kulaputro vā kuladuhitā vā vivartiṣyaty anuttarāyāḥ samyaksaṃbodheḥ, sa sarva imaṃ
K02psp_5u:1108: prajñāpāramitāmanasikāram anāgamya vivartiṣyati, na saṃjñāsyate kathaṃ
K02psp_5u:1109: prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caratā bodhisattvena mahāsattvenākāśākṣayābhinirhāreṇa pratītyasamutpādo vyavalokayitavyaḥ? katham abhinirhartavya? iti. ye kecit subhūte bodhisattvayānikāḥ pudgalā vivartante sarve ta idam upāyakauśalyam anāgamya vivartante 'nuttarāyāḥ samyaksaṃbodheḥ. ye kecit subhūte
K02psp_5u:1110: bodhisattvā mahāsattvā na vivartante 'nuttarāyāḥ samyaksaṃbodheḥ sarve ta
K02psp_5u:1111: imāṃ prajñāpāramitām āgamya na vivartante 'nuttarāyāḥ samyaksaṃbodher
K02psp_5u:1112: upāyakauśalyena. evaṃ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caratā bodhisattvena mahāsattven ākāśākṣayābhinirhāreṇa prajñāpāramitā vyavalokayitavyā abhinirhartavyā.
K02psp_5u:1113: evaṃ khalu subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ pratītyasamutpādaṃ vyavalokayan na kaṃcid dharmaṃ samanupaśyati, ahetukam utpadyamānan na kaṃcid dharmaṃ samanupaśyati, nirudhyamānan na kaṃcid dharmam ātmataḥ samanupaśyati na sattvato na jīvato na jantuto na poṣato na puruṣato na pudgalato na manujato na mānavato na kārakato notthāpakato na samutthāpakato na vedakato na vedāpakato na jānakato na jānāpakato na paśyakato na paśyāpakato, na nityato nānityataḥ samanupaśyati na sukhato na duṣkhato nātmakato nānātmakato na śāntato nāśāntataḥ.
K02psp_5u:1114: evaṃ khalu subhūte bodhisattvena mahāsattvena pratītyasamutpādo (PSP_5:81)
K02psp_5u:1115: vyavalokayitavyaḥ prajñāpāramitāyāñ caratā, yasmin samaye subhūte
K02psp_5u:1116: bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ prajñāpāramitāyāñ carati tasmin samaye rūpaṃ na samanupaśyati nityaṃ vā anityaṃ vā sukhaṃ vā duṣkhaṃ vā ātmā vā anātmā vā śāntaṃ vā aśāntaṃ vā śubhaṃ vā aśubhaṃ vā, vedanā saṃjñā saṃskārā,
K02psp_5u:1117: vijñānaṃ na samanupaśyati nityaṃ vā anityaṃ vā sukhaṃ vā duṣkhaṃ vā ātmā vā anātmā vā śāntaṃ vā aśāntaṃ vā śubhaṃ vā aśubhaṃ vā. evaṃ vyastasamastān skandhadhātvāyatanapratītyasamutpādān
K02psp_5u:1118: pratītyasamutpādāṅgāni vā na samanupaśyati nityaṃ vā anityaṃ vā sukhaṃ vā duṣkhaṃ vā ātmā vā anātmā vā śāntaṃ vā aśāntaṃ vā śubhaṃ vā aśubhaṃ vā.
K02psp_5u:1119: evaṃ sarvapāramitān na samanupaśyati, sarvaśūnyatān na samanupaśyati,
K02psp_5u:1121: āryasatyāpramāṇadhyānārūpyasamāpattīḥ śūnyatānimittāpraṇihitān sarvavimokṣasamādhisamāpattidhāraṇīmukhābhijñādaśabalavaiśāradyapratisaṃvidāveṇikabuddhadharmān na samanupaśyati nityaṃ vā anityaṃ vā sukhaṃ vā duṣkhaṃ vā ātmā vā anātmā vā śāntaṃ vā aśāntaṃ vā śubhaṃ vā aśubhaṃ vā. sarvākārajñatān na samanupaśyati nityaṃ vā anityaṃ vā sukhaṃ vā duḥkhaṃ vā ātmā vā anātmā vā śāntaṃ vā aśāntaṃ vā śubhaṃ vā aśubhaṃ vā. yasmin samaye subhūte
K02psp_5u:1122: bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ carati tasmin samaye bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caran prajñāpāramitān na samanupaśyati, tam api dharman na samanupaśyati yena dharmeṇa prajñāpāramitāṃ na
K02psp_5u:1123: samanupaśyati, dhyānapāramitān na samanupaśyati, vīryapāramitān na samanupaśyati, kṣāntipāramitān na samanupaśyati, śīlapāramitān na samanupaśyati, dānapāramitān na samanupaśyati, tam api dharman na samanupaśyati yena dharmeṇa yāvad dānapāramitāṃ samanupaśyet. evaṃ smṛtyupasthānasamyakprahāṇarddhipādendriyabalabodhyaṅgāny āryāstāṅgamārgan
K02psp_5u:1124: na samanupaśyati, tam api dharman na samanupaśyati yena
K02psp_5u:1125: dharmeṇāryāṣṭāṅgamārgaṃ samanupaśyet. adhyātmaśūnyatāṃ bahirdhāśūnyatāṃ yāvad abhāvasvabhāvaśūnyatāṃ na samanupaśyati, tam api dharman na samanupaśyati yena dharmeṇa yāvad abhāvasvabhāvaśūnyatāṃ samanupaśyed āryasatyāpramāṇadhyānārūpyavimokṣasamādhisamāpattīr na samanupaśyati, tam api dharman na samanupaśyati yena
K02psp_5u:1127: samanupaśyet. śūnyatānimittāpraṇihitāṃ na samanupaśyati, tam api dharman
K02psp_5u:1128: na samanupaśyati, yena dharmeṇa śūnyatānimittāpraṇihitān samanupaśyet.
K02psp_5u:1129: sarvavimokṣasamādhisamāpattidhāraṇīmukhāni na samanupaśyati, tam api dharman1 na samanupaśyati yena dharmeṇa sarvavimokṣasamādhisamāpattidhāraṇīmukhāni samanupaśyet.
K02psp_5u:1130: abhijñādaśabalavaiśāradyapratisaṃvido na samanupaśyati, tam api dharman na samanupaśyati yena
K02psp_5u:1131: samanupaśyet. aṣṭādaśāveṇikān buddhadharmān na samanupaśyati, tam api dharmān na samanupaśyati yena dharmeṇāṣṭādaśāveṇikān buddhadharmān
K02psp_5u:1132: samanupaśyet. anuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhin na samanupaśyati, tam api dharman
K02psp_5u:1133: na samanupaśyati yena dharmeṇānuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhiṃ samanupaśyet.
K02psp_5u:1134: evaṃ khalu subhūte bodhisattvena mahāsattvena prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caritavyaṃ sarvadharmān anupalabhamānena. yasmin samaye subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ sarvadharmān anupalabhamānaḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ carati tasmin samaye māraḥ pāpīyāṃ śokaśalyasamarpito bhavati, tadyathāpi nāma subhūte
K02psp_5u:1135: puruṣasya mātāpitarau kālagatau bhavataḥ sa tena duṣkhena śokaśalyasamarpito bhavati parameṇa śokaśalyena samanvāgataḥ, evam eva subhūte māraḥ pāpīyāṃ bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya prajñāpāramitāyāṃ
K02psp_5u:1136: carataḥ sarvadharmān anupalabhamānasya śokasalyasamarpito bhavati parameṇa śokaśalyena samanvāgataḥ.
K02psp_5u:1137: evam ukte āyuṣmān subhūtir bhagavantam etad avocat: eka eva bhagavan māraḥ pāpīyān paramaśokaśalyena samanvāgato bhavati, utāho ye trisāhasramahāsāhasre lokadhātau mārāḥ pāpīyāṃsas te sarve parameṇa śokaśalyena samanvāgatā bhavanti, svakasvakeṣv āsaneṣu na ramante?
K02psp_5u:1138: bhagavān āha: sarva eva subhūte mārāḥ pāpīyāṃsaḥ parameṇa śokaśalyena samanvāgatā bhavanti, svakasvakeṣv āsaneṣu na ramante, yadā subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ prajñāpāramitāvihāreṇāvirahito bhavati, evaṃ viharataḥ subhūte bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya sadevamānuṣāsuraloko
K02psp_5u:1139: 'vatāran na labhate yatra gṛhītvā viheṭhayet, tasmāt tarhi subhūte
K02psp_5u:1140: bodhisattvena mahāsattvenānuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhim abhisaṃboddhukāmena prajñāpāramitāvihāreṇa vihartavyam. ity uktam akṣayākāraṃ kṣayajñānam anutpādākāram anutpādajñānam
K02psp_5u:1141: prajñāpāramitāvihāreṇa viharato bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya dānapāramitā bhāvanāparipūriṃ gacchati, śīlapāramitā bhāvanāparipūriṃ gacchati,
K02psp_5u:1142: kṣāntipāramitā bhāvanāparipūriṃ gacchati, vīryapāramitā bhāvanāparipūriṃ gacchati, dhyānapāramitā bhāvanāparipūriṃ gacchati, prajñāpāramitā bhāvanāparipūriṃ gacchati. prajñāpāramitāyāṃ carato bodhisattvasya
K02psp_5u:1143: mahāsattvasya sarvāḥ pāramitā bhāvanāparipūriṃ gacchanti atha khalv āyuṣmān subhūtir bhagavantam etad avocat: kathaṃ bhagavan bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya prajñāpāramitāyāṃ carato dānapāramitā bhāvanāparipūriṃ gacchati, śīlapāramitā bhāvanāparipūriṃ gacchati,
K02psp_5u:1144: kṣāntipāramitā bhāvanāparipūriṃ gacchati, vīryapāramitā bhāvanāparipūriṃ gacchati, dhyānapāramitā bhāvanāparipūriṃ gacchati, prajñāpāramitā bhāvanāparipūriṃ gacchati?
K02psp_5u:1145: evam ukte bhagavān āyuṣmantaṃ subhūtim etad avocat: iha subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ sarvākārajñatāyāṃ pariṇāmayan dānan dadāti, evaṃ khalu subhūte bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya dānapāramitā bhāvanāparipūriṃ
K02psp_5u:1146: gacchati. iha subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ sarvākārajñatāyāṃ pariṇāmayan śīlaṃ rakṣati, evaṃ khalu subhūte bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya śīlapāramitā bhāvanāparipūriṃ gacchati. iha subhūte bodhisattvo
K02psp_5u:1147: mahāsattvaḥ sarvākārajñatāyāṃ pariṇāmayan kṣāntyā saṃpādayati, evaṃ khalu subhūte bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya kṣāntipāramitā bhāvanāparipūriṃ gacchati. iha subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ sarvākārajñatāyāṃ pariṇāmayan vīryam ārabhate, evaṃ khalu subhūte bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya vīryapāramitā bhāvanāparipūriṃ gacchati. iha subhūte bodhisatttvo mahāsattvaḥ sarvākārajñatāyāṃ pariṇāmayan dhyānaṃ samāpadyate, evaṃ khalu subhūte bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya dhyānapāramitā bhāvanāparipūriṃ gacchati. iha subhūte bodhisattvo
K02psp_5u:1148: mahāsattvaḥ sarvākārajñatāyāṃ pariṇāmayan prajñāṃ bhāvayati, evaṃ khalu subhūte bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya prajñāpāramitā bhāvanāparipūriṃ gacchati.
K02psp_5u:1149: atha khalv āyuṣmān subhūtir bhagavantam etad avocat: kathaṃ bhagavan bodhisattvo mahāsattvo dānapāramitāyāṃ sthitvā śīlapāramitāṃ parigṛhṇāti?
K02psp_5u:1150: bhagavān āha: iha subhūte bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya dānapāramitāyāṃ sthitvā dānan dadataḥ sarvākārajñatāyāṃ pariṇāmayataḥ sattveṣu maitraṃ kāyakarma maitraṃ vākkarma maitraṃ manaḥkarma pratyupasthitaṃ bhavati,
K02psp_5u:1151: evaṃ khalu subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvo dānapāramitāyāṃ sthitvā śīlapāramitāṃ parigṛhṇāti.
K02psp_5u:1152: subhūtir āha: kathaṃ bhagavan bodhisattvo mahāsattvo dānapāramitāyāṃ sthitvā kṣāntipāramitāṃ
K02psp_5u:1153: bhagavān āha: iha subhūte bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya dānapāramitāyāṃ sthitvā dānan dadato yad idaṃ pratigrāhakā ākrośanti vā paribhāṣante vā,
K02psp_5u:1154: asatyābhiś ca paruṣābhir vāgbhiḥ samudācaranti, na ca teṣām antike cittam āghātayati, evaṃ khalu subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvo dānapāramitāyāṃ
K02psp_5u:1156: subhūtir āha: kathaṃ bhagavan boddhisattvo mahāsattvo dānapāramitāyāṃ sthitvā vīryapāramitāṃ
K02psp_5u:1157: bhagavān āha: iha subhūte bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya dānapāramitāyāṃ sthitvā danan dadatas te pratigrāhakā yady ākrośanti vā paribhāṣante vā asatyāṃ vā paruṣāṃ vā vācaṃ samudācaranti tasyākruṣyamāṇasya vā
K02psp_5u:1158: paribhāṣyamāṇasya vā, asatyayā vā paruṣayā vā vācā samudācaryamāṇasya
K02psp_5u:1159: dānabuddhir eva bhavati, parityāgabuddhir eva bhavati, dātavyañ caiva mayā
K02psp_5u:1160: dānan, na mayā na dātavyaṃ sa kāyikañ ca caitasikañ ca vīryaṃ sa vyañjanayati, evaṃ khalu subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvo dānapāramitāyāṃ
K02psp_5u:1162: subhūtir āha: kathaṃ bhagavan bodhisattvo mahāsattvo dānapāramitāyāṃ sthitvā dhyānapāramitāṃ
K02psp_5u:1163: bhagavān āha: iha subhūte bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya dānapāramitāyāṃ sthitvā dānan dadato dānaṃ parityajataḥ sarvākārajñatāyāṃ pariṇāmayate, na śrāvakabhūmau vā na pratyekabuddhabhūmau vā cittaṃ pariṇāmayaty, anyatra sarvākārajñatārambaṇam eva cittaṃ pravartate, evaṃ khalu subhūte
K02psp_5u:1164: bodhisattvo mahāsattvo dānapāramitāyāṃ sthitvā dhyānapāramitāṃ parigṛhṇāti.
K02psp_5u:1165: subhūtir āha: kathaṃ bhagavan bodhisattvo mahāsattvo dānapāramitāyāṃ sthitvā prajñāpāramitāṃ
K02psp_5u:1166: bhagavān āha: iha subhūte bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya dānapāramitāyāṃ sthitvā dānan dadato dānaṃ parityajataḥ, tasya māyābuddhir eva dāne pratyupasthitā bhavati, tena ca dānena na kasyacit sattvasyopakāraṃ
K02psp_5u:1167: vāpakāraṃ vā paśyaty, evaṃ khalu subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvo dānapāramitāyāṃ sthitvā pprajñāpāramitāṃ parigṛhṇāti.
K02psp_5u:1168: atha khalv āyuṣmān subhūtir bhagavantam etad avocat: kathaṃ bhagavan bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ śīlapāramitāyāṃ sthito dānapāramitāṃ parigṛhṇāti?
K02psp_5u:1169: bhagavān āha: iha subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ śīlapāramitāyāṃ sthito
K02psp_5u:1170: yaḥ kāyikaś ca vācikaś ca caitasikaś ca saṃvaras tena saṃvarena na śrāvakabhūmiṃ vā na pratyekabuddhabhūmiṃ vā parāmṛṣati, tatra ca śīlapāramitāyāṃ sthito na sattvān jīvitād vyaparopayati, nādattam ādadāti,
K02psp_5u:1171: na kāmeṣu mithyā carati, na mṛṣāvāg bhavati, na paruṣavāg bhavati na piśunāṃ vācaṃ bhāṣate, na saṃbhinnapralāpī bhavati, nābhidhyālur bhavati,
K02psp_5u:1172: na vyāpannacitto bhavati, na mithyādṛṣṭir bhavati, sa tatra śīlapāramitāyāṃ sthito yad dānan dadāty annam annārthikānāṃ pānaṃ pānārthikānāṃ yānaṃ yānārthikānāṃ vastraṃ vastrārthikānāṃ mālyaṃ
K02psp_5u:1173: mālyārthikānāṃ vilepanaṃ vilepanārthikānāṃ śayanaṃ śayanārthikānām upāśrayam upāśrayārthikānāṃ pradīpaṃ pradīpārthikānāṃ upakaraṇam upakaraṇārthikānām anyatarānyatarāṇi mānuṣyakāṇi sarvapariṣkāropakaraṇāni
K02psp_5u:1174: dadāti, tac ca dānaṃ sarvasattvasādhāraṇaṃ kṛtvā anuttarāyai
K02psp_5u:1175: samyaksaṃbodhaye pariṇāmayati, tathā ca pariṇāmayati yathā na śrāvakapratyekabuddhabhūmau vā pariṇāmayati, evaṃ khalu subhūte
K02psp_5u:1176: bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ śīlapāramitāyāṃ sthito dānapāramitāṃ parigṛhṇāti.
K02psp_5u:1177: subhūtir āha: kathaṃ bhagavan bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ śīlapāramitāyāṃ sthitaḥ kṣāntipāramitāṃ
K02psp_5u:1178: bhagavān āha: iha subhūte bodhisattvasya mahāsatttvasya śīlapāramitāyāṃ sthitasya sarvasattvā aṅgapratyaṅgāni cchitvā cchitvā gaccheyus tatra bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya ekacittotpādo 'pi na kṣubhyate na vyāpadyate
K02psp_5u:1179: 'nyatra cāsyaivaṃ bhavati, sulabdhā me lābhā (PSP_5:86) yatra hi nāma mama sattvā aṅgapratyaṅgāni cchitvā cchitvā gaccheyur, evaṃ khalu subhūte
K02psp_5u:1180: bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ śīlapāramitāyāṃ sthitaḥ kṣāntipāramitāṃ parigṛhṇāti.
K02psp_5u:1181: subhūtir āha: kathaṃ bhagavan bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ śīlapāramitāyāṃ sthito vīryapāramitāṃ
K02psp_5u:1182: bhagavān āha: iha subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvo na kāyena na cittena vīryaṃ srasayati, sarvasattvā mayottārayitavyāḥ saṃsārataḥ amṛte dhātau pratiṣṭhāpayitavyāḥ, evaṃ khalu subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ śīlapāramitāyāṃ sthito vīryapāramitāṃ parigṛhṇāti.
K02psp_5u:1183: subhūtir āha: kathaṃ bhagavan bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ śīlapāramitāyāṃ sthito dhyānapāramitāṃ
K02psp_5u:1184: bhagavān āha: iha subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ prathamaṃ dhyānaṃ
K02psp_5u:1185: samāpadyate dvitīyaṃ dhyānaṃ samāpadyate tṛtīyaṃ dhyānaṃ samāpadyate caturthaṃ dhyānaṃ samāpadyate, na ca śrāvakabhūmiṃ vā na pratyekabuddhabhūmiṃ vādhyālambate 'nyatra cāsyaivaṃ bhavati, iha mayā dhyānapāramitāyāṃ sthitvā sarvasattvāḥ saṃsārād uttārayitavyāḥ, evaṃ khalu subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ śīlapāramitāyāṃ sthito dhyānapāramitāṃ
K02psp_5u:1187: subhūtir āha: kathaṃ bhagavan bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ śīlapāramitāyāṃ sthitaḥ prajñāpāramitāṃ
K02psp_5u:1188: bhagavān āha: iha subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ śīlapāramitāyāṃ sthito
K02psp_5u:1189: na kañcid dharmaṃ saṃskṛtaṃ vāsaṃskṛtaṃ vā paśyati, na nimittan nānimittaṃ
K02psp_5u:1190: paśyati, na kasyacid dharmasyāsti tvaṃ vā nāsti tvaṃ vā paśyaty anyatra sarvadharmatathatān na vyativartante, tayā ca prajñāpāramitayopāyakauśalyena na śrāvakabhūmiṃ vā na pratyekabuddhabhūmiṃ
K02psp_5u:1191: vā pataty, evaṃ khalu subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ śīlapāramitāyāṃ
K02psp_5u:1193: atha khalv āyuṣmān subhūtir bhagavantam etad avocat: kathaṃ bhagavan bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ kṣāntipāramitāyāṃ sthitvā dānapāramitāṃ parigṛhṇāti?
K02psp_5u:1194: bhagavān āha: iha subhūte bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya (PSP_5:87)
K02psp_5u:1195: prathamacittotpādam upādāya yāvad bodhimaṇḍaniṣaṇṇasya sarvasattvā yady ākrośayeyuḥ paribhāṣerann aṅgapratyaṅgāni cācchidyus tatra bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya kṣāntipāramitāyāṃ sthitasyaivaṃ bhavati, dātavyaṃ mayaiteṣāṃ sattvānāṃ dānaṃ, na mayaiteṣāṃ sattvānāṃ dānaṃ na dātavyaṃ, sa teṣāṃ sattvānām annam annārthikānāṃ dadāti, pānaṃ pānārthikānāṃ dadāti, yānaṃ yānārthikānāṃ dadāti,
K02psp_5u:1196: śayanāsanavastrahiraṇyasuvarṇamaṇimuktāvaiḍūryamarakataśaṃkhaśilāpravālavajrendranīlasarvaratnaglānapratyayabhaiṣajyapariṣkārādīni dadāti yāvad anyatarānyatarāṇi mānuṣyakāṇi pariṣkāropakaraṇāni dadāti, tac ca kuśalamūlaṃ sarvasattvasādhāraṇaṃ kṛtvā sarvākārajñatāyāṃ pariṇāmayati,
K02psp_5u:1197: tathā ca pariṇāmayati yathāsya trividhā buddhir na pravartate, ko vā pariṇāmayati, kiṃ vā pariṇāmayati, kutra vā pariṇāmayati. evaṃ khalu subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ kṣāntipāramitāyāṃ sthitvā dānapāramitāṃ
K02psp_5u:1199: subhūtir āha: kathaṃ bhagavan bodhisattvo nmahāsattvaḥ kṣāntipāramitāyāṃ sthitvā śīlapāramitāṃ
K02psp_5u:1200: bhagavān āha: iha subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ prathamacittotpādam upādāya yāvad bodhimaṇḍaniṣanṇo 'trāntare na kaścit sattvo jīvitād vyaparopito na daihikī bodhyaṅgatāghātadoṣakriyā vā utpāditā, nādattam
K02psp_5u:1201: ādadāti, na kāmamithyācārī bhavati, na mṛṣāvāg bhavati, na paruṣavāg bhavati, na piśunavāg bhavati, nābaddhapralāpī bhavati, nābhidhyālur
K02psp_5u:1202: bhavati, na vyāpannacitto bhavati, na mithyādṛṣṭir bhavati, na cāsya srāvakapratyekabuddhabhūmau cittaṃ krāmati, tāni ca kuśalamūlāni
K02psp_5u:1204: tathā ca pariṇāmayati yathāsya trividhā buddhir na pravartate, ka eṣa pariṇāmayati, kiṃ vā pariṇāmayati, kutra vā pariṇāmayati. evaṃ khalu subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ kṣāntipāramitāyāṃ sthitvā śīlapāramitāṃ
K02psp_5u:1206: subhūtir āha: kathaṃ bhagavan bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ kṣāntipāramitāyāṃ sthitvā vīryapāramitāṃ
K02psp_5u:1207: bhagavān āha: iha subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ kṣāntipāramitāyāṃ (PSP_5:88) sthitvā vīryaṃ sa vyañjanayati, nāhaṃ yojanaṃ vā gatvā yojanaśataṃ vā yojanasahasraṃ vā yojanaśatasahasraṃ vā yojanakoṭī niyutaśatasahasraṃ vā, lokadhātuṃ vā lokadhātuśataṃ vā lokadhātusahasraṃ vā lokadhātuśatasahasraṃ vā lokadhātuniyutaśatasahasraṃ vā lokadhātukoṭīṃ
K02psp_5u:1208: vā lokadhātukoṭīśataṃ vā lokadhātukoṭīsahasraṃ vā lokadhātukoṭīśatasahasraṃ vā lokadhātukoṭīniyutaśatasahasraṃ vā gatvā tatrāntaśa ekasattvam api śaraṇagamanaśikṣāpadeṣu na pratiṣṭhāpayeyaṃ
K02psp_5u:1209: srotaāpattiphale vā sakṛdāgāmiphale vā anāgāmiphale vā arhattvaphale vā na pratiṣṭhāpayeyaṃ pratyekabodhau vā na pratiṣṭhāpayeyam anuttarāyāṃ vā samyaksaṃbodhau na pratiṣṭhāpayeyaṃ, tāni ca kuśalamūlāni sarvasattvaiḥ sārdhaṃ sādhāraṇāni kṛtvānuttarāyai samyaksaṃbodhaye pariṇāmayati tathā ca pariṇāmayati yathāsya trividhā buddhir na pravartate, ko vā pariṇāmayati,
K02psp_5u:1210: kiṃ vā pariṇāmayati, kutra vā pariṇāmayati. evaṃ khalu subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ kṣānatipāramitāyāṃ sthitvā vīryapāramitāṃ parigṛhṇāti.
K02psp_5u:1211: subhūtir āha: kathaṃ bhagavan bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ kṣāntipāramitāyāṃ sthitvā dhyānapāramitāṃ
K02psp_5u:1212: bhagavān āha: iha subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ kṣāntipāramitāyāṃ sthitvā prathamaṃ dhyānam upasaṃpadya viharati, dvitīyaṃ dhyānam upasaṃpadya viharati, tṛtīyaṃ dhyānam upasaṃpadya viharati, caturthaṃ dhyānam upasaṃpadya viharati, utpannotpannāṃś cittacetasikān dharmān
K02psp_5u:1213: kuśalamūlopasaṃhitān sarvasattveṣu sādhāraṇān kṛtvā sarvākārajñatāyāṃ pariṇāmayati, tathā ca pariṇāmayati, yathā dhyānāni ca dhyānāṅgāni ca tasmin samaye nopalabhate. evaṃ khalu subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ kṣāntipāramitāyāṃ sthitvā dhyānapāramitāṃ parigṛhṇāti.
K02psp_5u:1214: subhūtir āha: kathaṃ bhagavan bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ kṣāntipāramitāyāṃ sthitvā prajñāpāramitāṃ
K02psp_5u:1215: bhagavān āha: iha subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ kṣāntipāramitāyāṃ sthitvā tasmin samaye dharme dharmānupaśyī viharati, viviktavihāreṇa vā śāntākāreṇa vākṣayākāreṇa vā na ca tāṃ dharmatāṃ sākṣātkaroti, yāvac ca na
K02psp_5u:1216: bodhimaṇḍe niṣaṇṇo bhavati, tatra ca niṣadya (PSP_5:89) sarvākārajñatām
K02psp_5u:1217: anuprāpsyati, utthāya dharmacakraṃ pravartayiṣyati, tāni ca kuśalamūlāni
K02psp_5u:1219: tathā ca pariṇāmayati yathāsya trividhā buddhir na pravartate, ko vā pariṇāmayati, kiṃ vā pariṇāmayati, kutra vā pariṇāmayati. evaṃ khalu subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ kṣāntipāramitāyāṃ sthitvā prajñāpāramitāṃ
K02psp_5u:1220: parigṛhṇāti, tathā ca parigṛhṇāti yathā nodgṛhṇāti tāvan notsṛjati.
K02psp_5u:1221: atha khalv āyuṣmān subhūtir bhagavantam etad avocat: kathaṃ bhagavan bodhisattvo mahāsattvo vīryapāramitāyāṃ sthitvā dānapāramitāṃ parigṛhṇāti?
K02psp_5u:1222: bhagavān āha: iha subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvo vīryapāramitāyāṃ sthitvā
K02psp_5u:1223: kāyena cittena caran na nikṣipati, avaśyañ caiva mayānuttarā
K02psp_5u:1225: samyaksaṃbodhiḥ, sattvānāṃ ca kṛtena yojanaṃ vā yojanaśataṃ vā yojanasahasraṃ vā yojanaśatasahasraṃ vā yojanakoṭīniyutaśatasahasraṃ vā lokadhātuṃ vā lokadhātuśataṃ vā lokadhātusahasraṃ vā lokadhātuśatasahasraṃ vā lokadhātukoṭīniyutaśatasahasraṃ vā gatvā vīryapāramitāyāṃ sthitvāntaśa
K02psp_5u:1226: ekasattvam apy anuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau pratiṣṭhāpayati, saced bodhisattvayānikaṃ pudgalaṃ labheta taṃ bodhicaryāsu pratiṣṭhāpayati.
K02psp_5u:1228: pratyekabuddhayānikaṃ pudgalaṃ pratyekabodhau pratiṣṭhāpayaty, antaśa ekasattvam api daśakuśaleṣu karmapatheṣu samādāpayati, sa tad dharmadānaṃ
K02psp_5u:1229: dattvā āmiṣadānena sattvān saṃtarpayati. sa tat kuśalamūlaṃ na śrāvakabhūmau vā na pratyekabuddhabhūmau vā pariṇāmayaty, anyatra sarvasattvaiḥ sārdhaṃ sādhāraṇaṃ kṛtvānuttarāyai samyaksaṃbodhaye
K02psp_5u:1230: pariṇāmayati, tathā ca pariṇāmayati yathāsya trividhā buddhir na
K02psp_5u:1231: pravartate, ko vā pariṇāmayati, kiṃ vā pariṇāmayati, kutra vā pariṇāmayati. evaṃ khalu subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvo vīryapāramitāyāṃ
K02psp_5u:1233: subhūtir āha: kathaṃ bhagavan bodhisattvo mahāsattvo vīryapāramitāyāṃ sthitvā śīlapāramitāṃ
K02psp_5u:1234: bhagavān āha: iha subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ prathamacittotpādam upādāya, yāvad bodhimaṇḍa etasminn antare, ātmanā ca prāṇātipātāt
K02psp_5u:1235: prativirato bhavati, parāṃś ca prāṇātipātaprativiratau samādāpayati,
K02psp_5u:1236: prāṇātipātavirateś ca varṇaṃ bhāṣate, ye cānye prāṇātipātāt prativiratā
K02psp_5u:1237: bhavanti, teṣāṃ ca varṇavādī bhavati samanujñaḥ. ātmanā cādattādānāt prativirato bhavati, parāṃś cādattādānaprativiratau samādāpayati,
K02psp_5u:1238: adattādānavirateś ca varṇaṃ bhāṣate, ye cānye 'dattādānāt prativiratā
K02psp_5u:1239: bhavanti, teṣāṃ ca varṇavādī bhavati samanujñaḥ. ātmanā ca kāmamithyācārāt
K02psp_5u:1240: prativirato bhavati, parāṃś ca kāmamithyācāraprativiratau samādāpayati,
K02psp_5u:1241: kāmamithyācāravirateś ca varṇaṃ bhāṣate, ye cānye kāmamithyācārāt
K02psp_5u:1242: prativiratā bhavanti, teṣām api varṇavādī bhavati samanujñaḥ. ātmanā ca mṛṣāvādāt prativirato bhavati, parāṃś ca mṛṣāvādaviratau samādāpayati,
K02psp_5u:1243: mṛṣāvādavirateś ca varṇaṃ bhāṣate, ye cānye mṛṣāvādāt prativiratā
K02psp_5u:1244: bhavanti, teṣām api varṇavādī bhavati samanujñaḥ. ātmanā ca paruṣavacanāt
K02psp_5u:1245: prativirato bhavati, parāṃś ca paruṣavacanaviratau samādāpayati,
K02psp_5u:1246: paruṣavacanavirateś ca varṇaṃ bhāṣate, ye cānye paruṣavacanāt prativiratā
K02psp_5u:1247: bhavanti, teṣām api varṇavādī bhavati samanujñaḥ. ātmanā ca piśunavacanāt
K02psp_5u:1248: prativirato bhavati, parāṃś ca piśunavacanaviratau samādāpayati,
K02psp_5u:1249: piśunavacanavirateś ca varṇaṃ bhāsate, ye cānye piśunavacanāt prativiratā
K02psp_5u:1250: bhavanti, teṣām api varṇavādī bhavati samanujñaḥ. ātmanā cābaddhapralāpāt prativirato bhavati, parāṃś cābaddhapralāpaviratau samādāpayati,
K02psp_5u:1251: abaddhapralāpavirateś ca varṇaṃ bhāṣate, ye 'pi cānye 'baddhapralāpāt
K02psp_5u:1252: prativiratā bhavanti, teṣām api varṇavādī bhavati samanujñaḥ. ātmanā cābhidhyāyāḥ prativirato bhavati, parāṃś cābhidhyāviratau samādāpayati,
K02psp_5u:1253: abhidhyāvirateś ca varṇaṃ bhāṣate, ye 'pi cānye 'bhidhyāyāḥ prativiratā
K02psp_5u:1254: bhavanti, teṣām api varṇavādī bhavati samanujñaḥ. ātmanā ca vyāpādāt
K02psp_5u:1255: prativirato bhavati, parāṃś ca vyāpādaviratau samādāpayati, vyāpādavirateś ca varṇaṃ bhāṣate, ye 'pi cānye vyāpādāt prativiratā bhavanti, teṣām api varṇavādī bhavati samanujñaḥ. ātmanā ca mithyādṛṣṭeḥ prativirato bhavati,
K02psp_5u:1256: parāṃś ca mithyādṛṣṭiviratau samādāpayati, mithyādṛṣṭivirateś ca varṇaṃ
K02psp_5u:1257: bhāṣate, (PSP_5:91) ye 'pi cānye mithyādṛṣṭeḥ prativiratā bhavanti, teṣām api varṇavādī bhavati samanujñaḥ. sa tayā śīlapāramitayā na kāmadhātuṃ prārthayati, na rūpadhātuṃ prārthayati, nārūpyadhātuṃ prārthayati, na śrāvakabhūmiṃ prārthayati, na pratyekabuddhabhūmiṃ prārthayati, anyatra tat kuśalamūlaṃ sarvasattvaiḥ sārdhaṃ sādhāraṇaṃ kṛtvānuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau pariṇāmayati, tathā ca pariṇāmayati yathāsya trividhā buddhir na pravartate, ko vā pariṇāmayati, kiṃ vā pariṇāmayati, kutra vā pariṇāmayati. evaṃ khalu subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvo vīryapāramitāyāṃ
K02psp_5u:1259: subhūtir āha: kathaṃ bhagavan bodhisattvo mahāsattvo vīryapāramitāyāṃ sthitvā kṣāntipāramitāṃ
K02psp_5u:1260: bhagavān āha: iha subhūte bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya prathamacittotpādam upādāya yāvad bodhimaṇḍaniṣaṇṇasya manuṣyabhūto vāmanuṣyabhūto vā
K02psp_5u:1261: cittavikṣepaṃ vā kuryād aṅgapratyaṅgāni cchitvā ādāya gacchet, tatra bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya vīryapāramitāyāṃ sthitasya naivaṃ bhavati, ko me cchinatti vā bhinatti vā harati vā, 'nyatra cāsyaivaṃ bhavati, sulabdhā me lābhā yeṣām evāham arthāya kāyaṃ pariharāmi, te caivāgamyāṅgapratyaṅgāni cchitvā gacchanti, dharmatā cāsya prakṛtyā
K02psp_5u:1262: sumanasikṛtā bhavati, tāni ca kuśalamūlāni na śrāvakabhūmau vā na pratyekabuddhabhūmau vā pariṇāmayaty, anyatra sarva sattvaiḥ sārdhaṃ sādhāraṇāni kṛtvānuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau pariṇāmayati, tathā ca pariṇāmayati yathāsya trividhā buddhir na bhavati, ko vā pariṇāmayati, kiṃ vā pariṇāmayati, kutra vā pariṇāmayati. evaṃ khalu subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvo vīryapāramitāyāṃ sthitvā kṣāntipāramitāṃ parigṛhṇāti.
K02psp_5u:1263: subhūtir āha: kathaṃ bhagavan bodhisattvo mahāsattvo vīryapāramitāyāṃ sthitvā dhyānapāramitāṃ
K02psp_5u:1264: bhagavān āha: iha subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvo viviktaṃ kāmair viviktaṃ pāpakair akuśalair dharmaiḥ savitarkaṃ savicāraṃ vivekajaṃ prītisukhaṃ prathamaṃ dhyānam upasaṃpadya viharati. vitarkavicārāṇāṃ vyupaśamād adhyātmaṃ saṃprasādāc cetasa ekotībhāvād avitarkam avicāraṃ samādhijaṃ prītisukhaṃ dvitīyaṃ dhyānam upasaṃpadya viharati. prīteś ca virāgād
K02psp_5u:1265: upekṣako viharati, smṛtimān saṃprajānaṃ sukhaṃ ca kāye na (PSP_5:92)
K02psp_5u:1266: pratisaṃvedayati yat tad āryā ācakṣate, upekṣakaḥ smṛtimān sukhavihārī
K02psp_5u:1267: tṛtīyaṃ dhyānam upasaṃpadya viharati. sa sukhasya ca prahāṇād duṣkhasya ca
K02psp_5u:1268: prahāṇāt pūrvam eva saumanasyadaurmanasyayor astaṃgamād aduṣkhāsukham upekṣāsmṛtipariśuddhañ caturthaṃ dhyānam upasaṃpadya viharati. sa sarvasattveṣu sukhasaṃjñāmanasikārād maitrīm apramāṇām upasaṃpadya
K02psp_5u:1269: viharati, sa sarvasattveṣu duṣkhasaṃjñāmanasikārāt karuṇām apramāṇām upasaṃpadya viharati, sa sarvasattveṣu pramuditāsaṃjñāmanasikārād muditām apramāṇām upasaṃpadya viharati, sa sarvasattveṣu sukhaduḥkhasaṃjñāmanasikārād upekṣām apramāṇām upasaṃpadya viharati. sa rūpe audārikasaṃjñāyāḥ prahāṇād ākāśasaṃjñāyāś ca manasikārād ākāśānantyāyatanam upasaṃpadya viharati, sa vijñāne śāntasaṃjñāyā
K02psp_5u:1270: manasikārād vijñānānantyāyatanam upasaṃpadya viharati, sa ākiṃcanyāyataneṣu śāntasaṃjñāmanasikārād ākiṃcanyāyatanam upasaṃpadya viharati, sa naivasaṃjñānāsaṃjñāyāḥ śāntasaṃjñāyā manasikārād naivasaṃjñānāsaṃjñāyatanam upasaṃpadya viharati. sa teṣām apramāṇānāñ
K02psp_5u:1271: cārūpyasamāpattīnāṃ ca vipākan na pratigṛhṇāty, anyatra yatra sarvasattvānām arthe kartavyaḥ, tatropapadyate sa tān sattvān ṣaṭsu pāramitāsu paripācayati dānapāramitāyāṃ śīlapāramitāyāṃ kṣāntipāramitāyāṃ vīryapāramitāyāṃ dhyānapāramitāyāṃ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ, buddhakṣetreṇa buddhakṣetraṃ saṃkrāmati, buddhāṃś ca bhagavataḥ paryupāste paripṛcchati paripraśnīkurute kuśalamūlāvaropanatayā, tāni ca kuśalamūlāni
K02psp_5u:1273: tathā ca pariṇāmayati yathāsya trividhā buddhir na bhavati, ko vā pariṇāmayati, kiṃ vā pariṇāmayati, kutra vā pariṇāmayati. evaṃ khalu subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvo vīryapāramitāyāṃ sthitvā dhyānapāramitāṃ
K02psp_5u:1275: subhūtir āha: kathaṃ bhagavan bodhisattvo mahāsattvo vīryapāramitāyāṃ sthitvā prajñāpāramitāṃ
K02psp_5u:1276: bhagavān āha: iha subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvo vīryapāramitāyāṃ sthitvā
K02psp_5u:1277: na dānapāramitān dravyataḥ samanupaśyati na bhāvato na nimittato na śīlapāramitāṃ dravyataḥ samanupaśyati na bhāvato na nimittato, na kṣāntipāramitāṃ dravyataḥ samanupaśyati na bhāvato na nimittato, na vīryapāramitāṃ dravyataḥ samanupaśyati na bhāvato na nimittato, na
K02psp_5u:1278: (PSP_5:93) dhyānapāramitāṃ dravyataḥ samanupaśyati na bhāvato na
K02psp_5u:1279: nimittato, na prajñāpāramitāṃ dravyataḥ samanupsaśyati na bhāvato na
K02psp_5u:1280: nimittataḥ. evaṃ smṛtyupasthānasamyakprahāṇarddhipādendriyabalabodhyaṅgāni mārgaṃ na dravyataḥ samanupaśyati na bhāvato na nimittataḥ,
K02psp_5u:1281: adhyātmaśūnyatāṃ bahirdhāśūnyatām adhyātmabahirdhāśūnyatāṃ yāvad abhāvasvabhāvaśūnyatān na dravyataḥ samanupaśyati na bhāvato na nimittataḥ, āryasatyāprmāṇadhyānārūpyasamāpattīr na dravyataḥ
K02psp_5u:1282: samanupaśyati na bhāvato na nimittataḥ, śūnyatānimittāpraṇihitāni pañcābhijñā na dravyataḥ samanupaśyati na bhāvato na nimittataḥ,
K02psp_5u:1283: sarvavimokṣasamādhisamāpattidhāraṇīmukhāni na dravyataḥ samanupaśyati na bhāvato na nimittataḥ, daśabalaviśāradyapratisaṃvidāveṇikābuddhadharmān na dravyataḥ samanupaśyati na bhāvato na nimittataḥ, sarvākārajñatān na dravyataḥ samanupaśyati na bhāvato na nimittataḥ, sarvadharmān na dravyataḥ samanupaśyati na bhāvato na nimittataḥ. sa evaṃ paśyan na kvacid dharmaniketaṃ karoti, sa yathā vādī tathā kārī ca bhavati, sa tāni kuśalamūlāni sarvasattvaiḥ sārdhaṃ sādhāraṇāni kṛtvānuttarāyai samyaksaṃbodhaye pariṇāmayati, tathā ca pariṇāmayati yathāsya trividhā buddhir na bhavati, ko vā pariṇāmayati, kiṃ vā pariṇāmayati, kutra vā pariṇāmayati. evaṃ khalu subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvo vīryapāramitāyāṃ
K02psp_5u:1285: atha khalv āyuṣmān subhūtir bhagavantam etad avocat: kathaṃ bhagavan bodhisattvo mahāsattvo dhyānapāramitāyāṃ sthito dānapāramitāṃ parigṛhṇāti?
K02psp_5u:1286: bhagavān āha: iha subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvo dhyānapāramitāyāṃ sthito
K02psp_5u:1287: viviktaṃ kāmair viviktaṃ pāpakair akuśalair dharmaiḥ savitarkaṃ savicāraṃ vivekajaṃ prītisukhaṃ prathamaṃ dhyānam upasaṃpadya viharati.
K02psp_5u:1288: vitarkavicārāṇāṃ vyupaśamād adhyātmaṃ saṃprasādāc caitasa ekotībhāvād avitarkam avicāraṃ vivekajaṃ prītisukhaṃ dvitīyaṃ dhyānam upasaṃpadya
K02psp_5u:1289: viharati. prīteś ca virāgād upekṣako viharati, smṛtimān saṃprajānaṃ sukhaṃ
K02psp_5u:1290: ca kāye na pratisaṃvedayati yat tad āryā ācakṣate upeksakaḥ smṛtimān sukhavihārī tṛtīyaṃ dhyānam upasaṃpadya viharati. sa sukhasya ca prahāṇāt duḥkhasya ca prahāṇāt pūrvam eva saumanasyadaurmanasyayor astaṃgamād aduṣkhāsukham upekṣāsmṛtipariśuddhañ (PSP_5:94) caturthaṃ dhyānam upasaṃpadya viharati. evam ākāśānantyāyatanasamāpattiṃ vijñānānantyāyatanasamāpattim ākiṃcanyāyatanasamāpattiṃ naivasaṃjñānāsaṃjñāyatanasamāpattim upasaṃpadya viharati, tatra dhyānapāramitāyāṃ sthito 'vikṣiptamānasas teṣāṃ sattvānām āmiṣadānaṃ
K02psp_5u:1291: dharmadānaṃ ca dadāti, parāṃś cāmiṣadāne dharmadāne ca samādāpayati,
K02psp_5u:1292: āmiṣadānasya dharmadānasya ca varṇaṃ bhāṣate, ye 'pi cānye āmiṣadānaṃ dharmadānañ ca dadāti, teṣāṃ ca varṇavādī bhavati samanujñaḥ. tac ca kuśalamūlaṃ na śrāvakabhūmau vā na pratyekabuddhabhūmau vā pariṇāmayaty,
K02psp_5u:1293: anyatra sarvasattvaiḥ sārdhaṃ sādhāraṇaṃ kṛtvānuttarāyai samyaksaṃbodhaye
K02psp_5u:1294: pariṇāmayati, tathā ca pariṇāmayati yathāsya trividhā buddhir na bhavati,
K02psp_5u:1295: ko vā pariṇāmayati, kiṃ vā pariṇāmayati, kutra vā pariṇāmayati. evaṃ khalu subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvo dhyānapāramitāyāṃ sthito dānapāramitāṃ
K02psp_5u:1297: subhūtir āha: kathaṃ bhagavan bodhisattvo mahāsattvo dhyānapāramitāyāṃ sthitaḥ śīlapāramitāṃ
K02psp_5u:1298: bhagavān āha: iha subhūte bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya dhyānapāramitāyāṃ sthitasya na rāgasahagataṃ cittam utpadyate, na doṣasahagataṃ cittam
K02psp_5u:1299: utpadyate, na mohasahagataṃ cittam utpadyate, na vicikitsāsahagataṃ cittam
K02psp_5u:1300: utpadyate, anyatra sarvākārajñatā pratisaṃyuktair manasikārair viaharati tac ca kuśalamūlaṃ na śrāvakabhūmau vā na pratyekabuddhabhūmau vā
K02psp_5u:1301: pariṇāmayaty anyatra sarvasattvaiḥ sārdhaṃ sādhāraṇaṃ kṛtvānuttarāyai samyaksaṃbodhaye pariṇāmayati tathā ca pariṇāmayati, yathāsya trividhā buddhir na bhavati, ko vā pariṇāmayati, kiṃ vā pariṇāmayati, kutra vā pariṇāmayati. evaṃ khalu subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvo dhyānapāramitāyāṃ
K02psp_5u:1303: subhūtir āha: kathaṃ bhagavan bodhisattvo mahāsattvo dhyānapāramitāyāṃ sthitaḥ kṣāntipāramitāṃ
K02psp_5u:1304: bhagavān āha: iha subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvo dhyānapāramitāyāṃ sthitaḥ
K02psp_5u:1305: phenapiṇḍopamaṃ rūpaṃ pratyavekṣate, budbdopamāṃ vedanāṃ pratyavekṣate,
K02psp_5u:1306: marīcyupamāṃ saṃjñāṃ pratyavekṣate, kadalyupamān saṃskārān pratyavekṣate,
K02psp_5u:1307: māyopamaṃ vijñānaṃ pratyavekṣate. tasyaivaṃ pratyavekṣamāṇasya pañcaskandheṣv asārakasaṃjñā pratyupasthitā bhavati, tasyaivaṃ (PSP_5:95)
K02psp_5u:1308: pratyavekṣamāṇasyaivaṃ bhavati, kasya vā rūpaṃ, kasya vā vedanā, kasya vā saṃjñā, kasya vā saṃskārāḥ, kasya vā vijñānaṃ, tasyaivaṃ pratyavekṣamāṇasyaivaṃ bhavati, ko vātrākruṣyate vā paribhāṣyate vā,
K02psp_5u:1309: ākruṣyamāṇasya vā paribhāṣyamāṇasya vā na vyāpāda utpadyate. sa tat kuśalamūlaṃ sarvasattvasādhāraṇaṃ kṛtvānuttarāyai samyaksaṃbodhaye
K02psp_5u:1310: pariṇāmayati, tathā ca pariṇāmayati yathāsya trividhā buddhir na bhavati,
K02psp_5u:1311: ko vā pariṇāmayati, kiṃ vā pariṇāmayati, kutra vā pariṇāmayati. evaṃ khalu subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvo dhyānapāramitāyāṃ sthitaḥ kṣāntipāramitāṃ
K02psp_5u:1313: subhūtir āha: kathaṃ bhagavan bodhisattvo mahāsattvo dhyānapāramitāyāṃ sthito vīryapāramitāṃ
K02psp_5u:1314: bhagavān āha: iha subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvo viviktaṃ kāmair viviktaṃ pāpakair akuśalamūlair dharmaiḥ savitarkaṃ savicāraṃ vivekajaṃ prītisukhaṃ prathamaṃ dhyānam upasaṃpadya viharati. vitarkavicārāṇāṃ vyupaśamād adhyātmaṃ saṃprasādāc cetasa ekotībhāvād avitarkam avicāraṃ vivekajaṃ prītisukhaṃ dvitīyaṃ dhyānam upasaṃpadya viharati. prīteś ca virāgād
K02psp_5u:1315: upekṣako viharati, smṛtimān saṃprajānaṃ sukhañ ca kāye na
K02psp_5u:1316: pratisaṃvedayati, yat tad āryā ācakṣate, upekṣakaḥ smṛtimān sukhavihārī
K02psp_5u:1317: tṛtīyaṃ dhyānam upasaṃpadya viharati. sukhasya ca prahāṇād duḥkhasya ca prahāṇāt pūrvam eva saumanasyadaurmanasyayor astaṃgamād aduḥkhāsukham
K02psp_5u:1318: upekṣāsmṛtipariśuddhaṃ caturthaṃ dhyānam upasaṃpadya viharati, sa dhyānānāṃ dhyānāṅgānāṃ nimittaṃ na gṛhṇāti, sa evaṃ samāhitacitto
K02psp_5u:1319: 'nekavidham ṛddhividhiṃ pratyanubhavati, vistareṇa kartavyaṃ, yāvad divyena śrotradhātunā ubhau śabdau śṛṇoti divyañ ca mānuṣyakañ ca, sa parasattvānāṃ parapudgalānāṃ cetasaiva cittaṃ prajānāti, vistareṇa yāvad anuttaraṃ cittam iti yathābhūtaṃ prajānāty, anekavidhaṃ pūrvanivāsam anusmarati, vistareṇa yāvad divyena cakṣuṣā viśuddhenātikrāntamānuṣyakena yāvad yathākarmopagān sattvān paśyati, sa iha pañcasv abhijñāsu pratiṣṭhāya buddhakṣetreṇa buddhakṣetraṃ gacchati, buddhān bhagavataḥ paryupāste paripṛcchati paripraśnīkaroti kuśalamūlāny avaropayati,
K02psp_5u:1320: buddhakṣetrañ ca pariśodhayati, tāni (PSP_5:96) ca kuśalamulāni na
K02psp_5u:1321: śrāvakabhūmau vā na pratyekabuddhabhūmau vā pariṇāmayaty, anyatra sarvasattvaiḥ sārdhaṃ sādhāraṇāni kṛtvānuttarāyai samyaksaṃbodhaye
K02psp_5u:1322: pariṇāmayati, tathā ca pariṇāmayati yathāsya trividhā buddhir na bhavati,
K02psp_5u:1323: ko vā pariṇāmayati, kiṃ vā pariṇāmayati, kutra vā pariṇāmayati. evaṃ khalu subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvo dhyānapāramitāyāṃ sthito vīryapāramitāṃ
K02psp_5u:1325: subhūtir āha: kathaṃ bhagavan bodhisattvo mahāsattvo dhyānapāramitāyāṃ sthitaḥ prajñāpāramitāṃ
K02psp_5u:1326: bhagavān āha: iha subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvo dhyānapāramitāyāṃ sthito
K02psp_5u:1327: rūpaṃ nopalabhate, vedanāṃ saṃjñāṃ saṃskārān, vijñānaṃ nopalabhate,
K02psp_5u:1328: skandhadhātvāyatanāni nopalabhate, pratītyasamutpādaṃ pratītyasamutpādāṅgāni nopalabhate, dānapāramitāṃ nopalabhate,
K02psp_5u:1336: anutpādayamāno na nirodhayati. tat kasya hetoḥ? tathā hi subhūte utpādād vā tathāgatānām anutpādād vā tathāgatānāṃ sthitaivaiṣā dharmāṇāṃ dharmasthititā dharmaniyāmatā sā naivotpadyate na nirudhyate, so
K02psp_5u:1337: 'vikṣiptacittasarvākārajñatāpratisaṃyuktair manasikārair avirahito bhavati. tac ca kuśalamūlaṃ sarvasattvasādhāraṇaṃ kṛtvānuttarāyai samyaksaṃbodhaye pariṇāmayati, tathā ca pariṇāmayati yathāsya trividhā buddhir na bhavati, ko vā pariṇāmayati, kiṃ vā pariṇāmayati, kutra vā pariṇāmayati. evaṃ khalu subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvo dhyānapāramitāyāṃ
K02psp_5u:1339: atha khalv āyuṣmān subhūtir bhagavantam etad avocat: kathaṃ bhagavan bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ sthitvā dānapāramitāṃ paripūrayati?
K02psp_5u:1340: bhagavān āha: iha subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caran
K02psp_5u:1341: sarvadharmāḥ śūnyā iti samanupaśyati. kathaṃ ca subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ sarvadharmāḥ śūnyā iti samanupaśyati? iha subhūte bodhisattvo
K02psp_5u:1344: adhyātmabahirdhāśūnyatādhyātmabahirdhāśūnyateti nopalabhate, yāvad abhāvaśūnyatā yāvad abhāvasvabhāvaśūnyateti nopalabhate. sa āsu śūnyatāsu
K02psp_5u:1345: sthitvā bodhisattvo mahāsattvo rūpan nopalabhate śūnyam iti vā aśūnyam iti
K02psp_5u:1346: vā, vedanā saṃjñā saṃskārā, vijñānaṃ nopalabhate śūnyam iti vā aśūnyam iti
K02psp_5u:1347: vā, skandhadhātvāyatanāni nopalabhate śūnyānīti vā aśūnyānīti vā,
K02psp_5u:1348: pratītyasamutpādaṃ pratītyasamutpādāṅgāni vā nopalabhate śūnyānīti vā aśūnyānīti vā, sarvapāramitā nopalabhate śūnyā iti vā aśūnyā iti vā,
K02psp_5u:1349: smṛtyupasthānasamyakprahāṇarddhipādendriyabalabodhyaṅgamārgā nopalabhate śūnyā iti vā aśūnyā iti vā, āryasatyāpramāṇadhyānārūpyasamāpattayo nopalabhate sūnyā iti vā aśūnyā iti vā,
K02psp_5u:1350: sarvavimokṣasamādhisamāpattidhāraṇīmukhāni nopalabhate śūnyānīti vā aśūnyānīti vā, śūnyatānimittāpraṇihitāni nopalabhate śūnyānīti vā aśūnyānīti vā, abhijñādaśabalavaiśāradyapratisaṃvidāveṇikābuddhadharmā nopalabhate śūnyā iti vā aśūnyā iti vā, anuttarā samyaksaṃbodhir nopalabhate śūnyeti vā aśūnyeti vā, saṃskṛto vā dhātur asaṃskṛto vā dhātur
K02psp_5u:1351: nopalabhate śūnya iti vā aśūnya iti vā. sa iha prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caran bodhisattvo mahāsattvo yadyad eva dānan dadāty annaṃ vā pānaṃ vā śayanaṃ
K02psp_5u:1352: vā āvasathaṃ vā glānapratyayabhaiṣajyapariṣkāraṃ vā vastraṃ vā suvarṇaṃ vā rūpyaṃ vā maṇimuktāśaṅkhaśilāpravālādīni vā puṣpadhūpagandhamālyavilepanacūrṇacīvaracchatradhvajapaṭākā vā yāvad anyatarānyatarāṇi mānuṣyakāṇi pariṣkāropakaraṇāni dadāti. sa tad dānaṃ
K02psp_5u:1353: śūnyam ity aśūnyam iti nopalabhate, yo vā dadāti yasyaivā dadāti tad api śūnyam iti aśūnyam iti nopalabhate, tasya mātsaryacittasya codgrahacittasya vāvakāśo na bhavati. tat kasya hetoḥ? sarva ete dharmāḥ
K02psp_5u:1354: prajñāpāramitāyāṃ carato bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya (PSP_5:98) vikalpā eva bhavanti, prathamacittotpadam upādāya yāvad bodhimaṇḍaniṣaṇṇasya yathā caiva tathāgatasyānuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhim abhisaṃbuddhasya na mātsaryacittaṃ vodgrahacittaṃ votpadyate, tathaiva bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya prajñāpāramitāyāṃ carato mātsaryacittaṃ vā udgrahacittaṃ vā
K02psp_5u:1355: nopapadyate, evam eva subhūte bodhisattvānāṃ mahāsattvānāṃ śāstā yad uta prajñāpāramitā, tāni ca kuśalamūlāni sarvasattvaiḥ sārdhaṃ sādhāraṇaṃ
K02psp_5u:1356: kṛtvānuttarāyai samyaksaṃbodhaye pariṇāmayati, tathā ca pariṇāmayati
K02psp_5u:1357: yathāsya trividhā buddhir na bhavati, ko vā pariṇāmayati, kiṃ vā pariṇāmayati, kutra vā pariṇāmayati. evaṃ khalu subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ sthitvā dānapāramitāṃ parigṛhṇāti.
K02psp_5u:1358: subhūtir āha: kathaṃ bhagavan bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ sthitvā śīlapāramitāṃ
K02psp_5u:1359: bhagavān āha: iha subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsatttvaḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ sthitvā na śrāvakapratyekabuddhabhūmicittānām avakāśaṃ dadāti. tat kasya hetoḥ? tathā hi sa śrāvakapratyekabuddhabhūmin nopalabhate, tad api cittan
K02psp_5u:1360: nopalabhate, yac chrāvakabhūmau vā pratyekabuddhabhūmau vā pariṇāmayati,
K02psp_5u:1362: prāṇātipātaprahāṇāya cittam utpādayati, ātmanā ca prāṇātipātāt prativirato
K02psp_5u:1363: bhavati, parāṃś ca prāṇātipātaviratau samādāpayati, prāṇātipātavirateś ca varṇaṃ bhāṣate, ye 'pi cānye prāṇātipātāt prativiratā bhavanti teṣām api
K02psp_5u:1364: varṇavādī bhavati samanujñaḥ. evam adattādānāt kāmamithyācārāt mṛṣāvādāt paruṣavacanāt piśunavacanād abaddhapralāpād abhidhyāyā vyāpādāt,
K02psp_5u:1365: mithyādṛṣṭeḥ prativirato bhavati, parāṃś ca mithyādṛṣṭiviratau
K02psp_5u:1366: samādāpayati, mithyādṛṣṭivirateś ca varṇaṃ bhāsate, ye 'pi cānye mithyādṛṣṭeḥ prativiratā bhavanti teṣām api varṇavādī bhavati samanujñaḥ.
K02psp_5u:1367: tena ca śīlena na kaścid dharmaṃ parāmṛśati śrāvakatvaṃ vā pratyekabuddhatvaṃ vā, prāg evānyad vā tāni ca kuśalamūlāni sarvasattveṣu sādhāraṇāni kṛtvānuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau pariṇāmayati, tathā ca pariṇāmayati yathāsya trividhā buddhir na bhavati, ko vā pariṇāmayati, kiṃ vā (PSP_5:99) pariṇāmayati, kutra vā pariṇāmayati. evaṃ khalu subhūte
K02psp_5u:1368: bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ sthitvā śīlapāramitāṃ parigṛhṇāti.
K02psp_5u:1369: subhūtir āha: kathaṃ bhagavan bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ sthitvā kṣāntipāramitāṃ
K02psp_5u:1370: bhagavān āha: iha subhūte bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya prajñāpāramitāyāṃ sthitasyānulomikī kṣāntir utpadyate, tasyaivaṃ bhavati, iha na kaścid
K02psp_5u:1371: dharma utpadyate vā nirudhyate vā mriyate vā ākruṣyate vā paribhāṣyate vā cchidyate vā bhidyate vā hanyate vā tasya prathamacittotpādam upādāya yāvad bodhimaṇḍaniṣaṇṇasya yadi sarvasattvā āgamyākroṣayur vā paribhāṣeran vā loṣṭadaṇḍaśastraprahārān dadyuś cchidyur bhidyur vā, tatra cāsyaivaṃ bhavati, aho dharmāṇāṃ dharmatā, na iha kaścid dharma ākruṣyate vā
K02psp_5u:1372: paribhāṣyate vā cchidyate vā bhidyate vā hanyate vā, sa tāni kuśalamūlāni
K02psp_5u:1374: tathā ca pariṇāmayati yathāsya trividhā buddhir na bhavati, ko vā pariṇāmayati, kiṃ vā pariṇāmayati, kutra vā parinamayati. evaṃ khalu subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ sthitvā kṣāntipāramitāṃ
K02psp_5u:1376: subhūtir āha: kathaṃ bhagavan bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ sthitvā vīryapāramitāṃ
K02psp_5u:1377: bhagavān āha: iha subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ sthitvā caturbhir ṛddhipādair upāyakauśalyena samanvāgataḥ kāyikañ ca caitasikañ ca vīryaṃ saṃjanayyānyaṃ lokadhātum api gatvā, lokadhātuśatam api gatvā, lokadhātusahasram api gatvā lokadhātuśatasahasram api gatvā
K02psp_5u:1378: lokadhātukoṭīniyutaśatasahasram api gatvā sattvānāṃ dharmaṃ deśayati.
K02psp_5u:1385: yāvad anuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau pratiṣṭhāpayati, tathā ca pratiṣṭhāpayati, yathā na saṃskṛte dhātau pratiṣṭhāpayati, nāsaṃskṛte dhātau pratiṣṭhāpayati tac ca kuśalamūlaṃ sarvasattveṣu sārdhaṃ sādhāraṇaṃ kṛtvānuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau pariṇāmayati, tathā ca pariṇāmayati, yathāsya trividhā buddhir na bhavati, ko vā pariṇāmayati,
K02psp_5u:1386: kiṃ vā pariṇāmayati, kutra vā pariṇāmayati. evaṃ khalu subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ sthitvā vīryapāramitāṃ parigṛhṇāti.
K02psp_5u:1387: subhūtir āha: kathaṃ bhagavan bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ sthitvā dhyānapāramitāṃ
K02psp_5u:1388: bhagavān āha: iha subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ sthitvā, tathāgatasamādhiṃ sthāpayitvā, yāvantaḥ kecit samādhayaḥ
K02psp_5u:1389: śrāvakasamādhir vā pratyekabuddhasamādhir vā tān sarvān samāpadyate ca vyuttiṣṭhate ca, samādhau sthitvā aṣṭau vimokṣān anulomaṃ pratilomaṃ
K02psp_5u:1390: samāpadyate ca vyuttiṣṭhate ca. katamān aṣṭau vimokṣān? iha subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvo 'dhyātmaṃ rūpasaṃjñī bahirdhārūpāṇi paśyaty, ayaṃ prathamo vimokṣaḥ. adhyātmam arūpasaṃjñī bahirdhārūpāṇi paśyaty ayaṃ dvitīyo vimokṣaḥ. śūnyatvenādhimuktaḥ śūnyatve cādhimukto bhavaty ayaṃ tṛtīyo vimokṣaḥ. sukhasya ca prahāṇād duṣkhasya ca prahāṇāt pūrvam eva saumanasyadaurmanasyayor astaṃgamād aduṣkhāsukham upekṣāsmṛtipariśuddhaṃ caturthaṃ dhyānam upasaṃpadya viharati. sa sarvaśo rūpasaṃjñānāṃ
K02psp_5u:1391: samatikramāt pratighasaṃjñānām astaṃgamād nānātvasaṃjñānām amanasikārād anantam ākāśam ity ākāśānantyāyatanam upasaṃpadya viharaty, ayaṃ caturtho vimokṣaḥ. sa sarvaśa ākāśānantyāyatanasamatikramād anantaṃ vijñānam iti
K02psp_5u:1392: vijñānānantyāyatanam upasaṃpadya viharaty, ayaṃ pañcamo vimokṣaḥ. sa sarvaśo vijñānānantyāyatanasamatikramād ākiṃcanyāyatanam upasaṃpadya viharaty, ayaṃ ṣaṣṭho vimokṣaḥ. sa sarvaśa ākiṃcanyāyatanasamatikramād
K02psp_5u:1393: naivasaṃjñānāsaṃjñāyatanam upasaṃpadya viharaty, ayaṃ saptamo vimokṣaḥ. sa sarvaśo naivasaṃjñānāsaṃjñāyatanasamatikramāt saṃjñāvedayitanirodham upasaṃpadya viharaty, ayam aṣṭamo vimokṣaḥ. itīmān aṣṭau vimokṣān anulomaṃ pratilomaṃ samāpadyate ca vyuttiṣṭhate ca, tatra samādhau sthitvā
K02psp_5u:1394: navānupūrvavihārasamāpattiīr anulomapratilomaṃ samāpadyate ca vyuttiṣṭhate ca. katamā navānupūrvavihārasamāpattīr? iha subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvo viviktaṃ kāmair viviktaṃ pāpakair akuśalair dharmaiḥ savitarkaṃ (PSP_5:101) savicāraṃ vivekajaṃ prītisukhaṃ prathamaṃ dhyānam upasaṃpadya
K02psp_5u:1395: viharati, vitarkavicārāṇāṃ vyupaśamād adhyātmaṃ saṃprasādāc cetasa ekotībhāvād avitarkam avicāraṃ vivekajaṃ prītisukhaṃ dvitīyaṃ dhyānam upasaṃpadya viharati, prīteś ca virāgād upekṣako viharati smṛtimān
K02psp_5u:1396: saṃprajānan sukhaṃ kāye na pratisaṃvedayate, yat tad āryā ācakṣate,
K02psp_5u:1397: upekṣakaḥ smṛtimān sukhavihārī tṛtīyaṃ dhyānam upasaṃpadya viharati. sa sukhasya ca prahāṇād duṣkhasya ca prahāṇāt pūrvam eva
K02psp_5u:1398: saumanasyadaurmanasyayor astaṃgamād aduṣkhāsukham upekṣāsmṛtipariśuddhiṃ caturthaṃ dhyānam upasaṃpadya viharati. sa sarvaśo rūpasaṃjñānāṃ
K02psp_5u:1399: samatikramāt pratighasaṃjñānām astaṃgamād nānātvasaṃjñānām amanasikārād anantam ākāśam ity ākāśānantyāyatanam upasaṃpadya viharati. sa sarvaśa ākāśānantyāyatanasamatikramād anantaṃ vijñānam iti vijñānānantyāyatanam upasaṃpadya viharati. sa sarvaśo vijñānānantyāyatanasamatikramād nāsti kiṃcid ity ākiṃcanyāyatanam upasaṃpadya viharati. sa sarvaśa ākiṃcanyāyatanasamatikramād naivasaṃjñānāsaṃjñāyatanam upasaṃpadya
K02psp_5u:1401: saṃjñāvedayitanirodhasamāpattim upasaṃpadya viharati. evam imā navānupūrvavihārasamāpattīr anulomapratilomaṃ samāpadyate ca vyuttiṣṭhate ca, imān aṣṭa vimokṣān imāś ca navānupūrvavihārasamāpattīr vibhaṅgaṃ kṛtvā imaṃ siṃhavijṛmbhitaṃ nāma samādhiṃ samāpadyate, tatra ca samādhau sthitvā dvādaśāṅgapratītyasamutpādam anulomapratilomaṃ pratyavekṣate. katamāni
K02psp_5u:1402: dvādaśāṅgāni? iha subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvo 'vidyāpratyayāḥ saṃskārā iti pratyavekṣate, evaṃ saṃskārapratyayaṃ vijñānaṃ vijñānapratyayaṃ nāmarūpamb nāmarūpapratyayaṃ ṣaḍāyatanaṃ ṣaḍāyatanapratyayaḥ sparśaḥ,
K02psp_5u:1403: sparśapratyayā vedanā, vedanāpratyayā tṛṣṇā, tṛṣṇāpratyayam upādānam,
K02psp_5u:1404: upādānapratyayo bhavo, bhavapratyayā jātiḥ, jātipratyayaṃ jarāmaraṇaṃ,
K02psp_5u:1406: evam asya kevalasya mahato duṣkhaskandhasya loke samudayo bhavatīti pratyavekṣate. jarāmaraṇe tasminn asati
K02psp_5u:1407: śokaparidevaduṣkhadaurmanasyopāyāsā na bhavantīti pratyavekṣate, evaṃ jātāv asatyāṃ jarāmaraṇan na bhavati, bhave 'sati jātir na bhavati,
K02psp_5u:1408: upādāne 'sati bhavo na bhavati, tṛṣṇāyām asatyām upādānan (PSP_5:102) na
K02psp_5u:1409: bhavati, vedanāyam asatyāṃ tṛṣṇā na bhavati, sparśe 'sati vedanā na bhavati, ṣaḍāyatane 'sati sparśo na bhavati, nāmarūpe 'sati ṣaḍāyatanan na bhavati, vijñāne 'sati nāmarūpan na bhavati, saṃskāreṣv asatsu vijñānan na
K02psp_5u:1410: bhavati, avidyāyām asatyāṃ saṃskārā na bhavantīti pratyavekṣate. evam asya kevalasya mahatā duṣkhaskandhasya loke nirodho bhavatīti pratyavekṣate.
K02psp_5u:1411: evam imaṃ dvādaśāṅgaṃ pratītyasamutpādam anulomapratilomaṃ pratyavekṣate,
K02psp_5u:1412: tāni ca kuśalamūlāni sarvasattvaiḥ sārdhaṃ sādhāraṇāni kṛtvānuttarāyai samyaksaṃbodhaye pariṇāmayati tathā ca pariṇāmayati yathāsya trividhā buddhir na bhavati, ko vā pariṇāmayati kiṃ vā pariṇāmayati, kutra vā pariṇāmayati. evaṃ khalu subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ
K02psp_5u:1413: sthitvā dhyānapāramitāṃ parigṛhṇāti. ity ukto darśanamārgaḥ
K02psp_5u:1414: katamaś ca subhūte bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya siṃhavijṛmbhitaḥ samādhir?
K02psp_5u:1415: iha subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvo viviktaṃ kāmair viviktaṃ pāpakair akuśalair dharmaiḥ savitarkaṃ savicāraṃ vivekajaṃ prītisukhaṃ prathamaṃ dhyānam upasaṃpadya viharati. evaṃ dvitīyaṃ dhyānam upasaṃpadya viharati,
K02psp_5u:1416: tṛtīyaṃ dhyānam upasaṃpadya viharati caturthaṃ dhyānam upasaṃpadya
K02psp_5u:1417: viharati, ākāśānantyāyatanasamāpattiṃ vijñānānantyāyatanasamāpattiṃ ākiṃcanyāyatanasamāpattin naivasaṃjñānāsaṃjñāyatanasamāpattim upasaṃpadya
K02psp_5u:1420: samāpadyate, naivasaṃjñānāsaṃjñāyatanasamāpatter vyutthāyākiṃcanyāyatanasamāpattiṃ samāpadyate, ākiṃcanyāyatanasamāpatter vyutthāya vijñānānantyāyatanasamāpattiṃ samāpadyate,
K02psp_5u:1421: vijñānānantyāyatanasamāpatter vyutthāyākāśānantyāyatanasamāpattiṃ samāpadyate, ākāśānantyāyatanasamāpatter vyutthāya caturthaṃ dhyānam
K02psp_5u:1422: upasaṃpadyate, caturthād dhyānād vyutthāya tṛtīyaṃ dhyānaṃ samāpadyate,
K02psp_5u:1423: tṛtīyād dhyānād vyutthāya dvitīyaṃ dhyānaṃ samāpadyate, dvitīyād dhyānād vyutthāya prathamaṃ dhyānaṃ samāpadyate. sa imaṃ siṃhavijṛmbhitaṃ samādhiṃ vibhaṅgaṃ kṛtvāvaskandakaṃ samādhiṃ samāpadyate. katamaś ca subhūte
K02psp_5u:1424: bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasyāvaskandakaḥ samādhir? iha subhūte bodhisattvo
K02psp_5u:1425: mahāsattvo viviktaṃ kāmair viviktaṃ (PSP_5:103) pāpakair akuśalair dharmaiḥ savitarkaṃ savicāraṃ vivekajaṃ prītisukhaṃ prathamaṃ dhyānam upasaṃpadya viharati, prathamād dhyānād vyutthito dvitīyaṃ dhyānaṃ upasaṃpadya viharati, dvitīyād dhyānād vyutthitas tṛtīyaṃ dhyānam upasaṃpadya viharati, tṛtīyād dhyānād vyutthitaś caturthaṃ dhyānam upasaṃpadya viharati, caturthyād dhyānād vyutthita
K02psp_5u:1427: ākāśānantyāyatanasamāpatter vyutthito vijñānānantyāyatanasamāpattim upasaṃpadya viharati, vijñānānantyāyatanasamāpatter vyutthita ākiṃcanyāyatanasamāpattim upasaṃpadya viharati, ākiṃcanyāyatanasamāpatter vyutthito naivasaṃjñānāsaṃjñāyatanasamāpattim upasaṃpadya viharati,
K02psp_5u:1428: naivasaṃjñānāsaṃjñāyatanasamāpatter vyutthitaḥ saṃjñāvedayitanirodhasamāpattim upasaṃpadya viharati. nirodhasamāpatter vyutthitaḥ prathamaṃ dhyānaṃ samāpadyate, prathamād dhyānād vyutthito
K02psp_5u:1430: dhyānaṃ samāpadyate dvitīyād dhyānād vyutthito nirodhasamāpittiṃ
K02psp_5u:1431: samāpadyate, nirodhasamāpatter vyutthitas tṛtīyaṃ dhyānaṃ samāpadyate,
K02psp_5u:1432: tṛtīyād dhyānād vyutthito nirodhasamāpattiṃ samāpadyate, nirodhasamāpatter vyutthitaś caturthaṃ dhyānaṃ samāpadyate, caturthād dhyānād vyutthito
K02psp_5u:1433: nirodhasamāpattiṃ samāpadyate, nirodhasamāpatter vyutthita ākāśānantyāyatanasamāpattiṃ samāpadyate, ākāśānantyāyatanasamāpatter vyutthito nirodhasamāpattiṃ samāpadyate, nirodhasamāpatter vyutthito vijñānānantyāyatanasamāpattiṃ samāpadyate, vijñānānantyāyatanasamāpatter vyutthito nirodhasamāpattiṃ samāpadyate, nirodhasamāpatter vyutthita ākiṃcanyāyatanasamāpattiṃ samāpadyate, ākiṃcanyāyatanasamāpatter vyutthito nirodhasamāpattiṃ samāpadyate, nirodhasamāpatter vyutthito naivasaṃjñānāsaṃjñāyatanasamāpattiṃ samāpadyate,
K02psp_5u:1435: nirodhasamāpatter vyutthito naivasaṃjñānāsaṃjñāyatānasamāpattiṃ samāpadyate naivasaṃjñānāsaṃjñāyatanasamāpatter vyutthito 'samāhite citte
K02psp_5u:1437: nirodhasamāpatter vyutthito 'samāhite citte tiṣṭhaty, asamāhitāc cittād naivasaṃjñānāsaṃjñāyatanasamāpattiṃ
K02psp_5u:1442: ākāśānantyāyatanasamāpatter vyutthito 'samāhite citte tiṣṭhaty, asamāhitāc cittād ākāśānantyāyatanasamāpattiṃ
K02psp_5u:1443: ākāśānantyāyatanasamāpatter vyutthito 'samāhite citte tiṣṭhaty, asamāhitāc cittāc caturthaṃ dhyānaṃ samāpadyate, caturthād dhyānād vyutthito
K02psp_5u:1444: 'samāhite citte tiṣṭhaty, asamāhitāc cittāt tṛtīyaṃ dhyānaṃ samāpadyate,
K02psp_5u:1445: tṛtīyād dhyānād vyutthito 'samāhite citte tiṣṭhaty, asamāhitāc cittād dvitīyaṃ dhyānaṃ samāpadyate, dvitīyād dhyānād vyutthito 'samāhite citte
K02psp_5u:1446: tiṣṭhaty, asamāhitāc cittāt prathamaṃ dhyānaṃ samāpadyate, prathamād dhyānād vyutthito 'samāhite citte tiṣṭhati. sa ihāvaskandake samādhau
K02psp_5u:1447: sthitvā sarvadharmasamatām anuprāpnoti, tāni ca kuśalamūlāni
K02psp_5u:1449: tathā ca pariṇāmayati yathāsya trividhā buddhir na bhavati, ko vā pariṇāmayati, kiṃ vā pariṇāmayati, kutra vā pariṇāmayati. evaṃ khalu subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvo 'vaskandakasamāpattiṃ samāpadyate ca vyuttiṣṭhate ca.
K02psp_5u:1450: ity ukto bhāvanāmārgaḥ subhūtir āha: bahuṣu sthāneṣu śikṣitavyaṃ bodhisattvena mahāsattvena
K02psp_5u:1452: bhagavān āha: evam etat subhūte evam etat, bahuṣu sthāneṣu śikṣitavyaṃ
K02psp_5u:1453: bodhisattvena mahāsattvena na kvacic chikṣitavyam. tat kasya hetoḥ? tathā hi te dharmā nopalabhyante yatra bodhisattvena mahāsattvena śikṣitavyam.
K02psp_5u:1454: atha khalv āyuṣmān subhūtir bhagavantam etad avocat: yat punar bhagavaṃs
K02psp_5u:1455: tathāgatena me saṃkṣiptena ca vistareṇa ca dharmā bhāṣitāḥ, tatra bodhisattvena mahāsattvenānuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhim abhisaṃboddhukāmenemāḥ ṣaṭ pāramitāḥ saṃkṣiptena ca vistareṇa ca paryavāptavyāḥ paryavāpya yāvad
K02psp_5u:1456: vācā parijitāḥ kartavyā yāvad vācā parijitāḥ kṛtvā manasā pratyavekṣitavyā, tathā ca cittacetasikā dharmā na pravartante, asmin punaḥ saṃkṣepavistare śikṣamāṇo bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ ṣaṇnāṃ pāramitānāṃ sarvadharmāṇāñ ca saṃkṣepavistaraṃ jñāsyati.
K02psp_5u:1457: subhūtir āha: kathaṃ bhagavan bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ sarvadharmāṇāṃ (PSP_5:105) saṃkṣepavistaraṃ
K02psp_5u:1458: bhagavān āha: rūpasya vā vedanāyā vā saṃjñāyā vā saṃskārāṇāṃ vā vijñānasya
K02psp_5u:1459: vā saṃkṣiptavistarañ ca tathatāṃ jānānaḥ. evaṃ skandhadhātvāyatanapratītyasamutpādasya vā pratītyasamutpādāṅgānāṃ vā saṃkṣiptavistaraṃ tathatāṃ jānānaḥ, evaṃ sarvapāramitānāṃ vā
K02psp_5u:1460: saptatriṃśatāṃ bodhipakṣyāṇāṃ dharmāṇāṃ vā āryasatyāpramāṇadhyānārūpyavimokṣasamādhisamāpattidhāraṇīmukhānāṃ vā śūnyatānimittāpraṇihitābhijñādaśabalavaiśāradyapratisaṃvidāveṇikānāṃ buddhadharmāṇāṃ vā sarvākārajñatāyā vā saṃkṣiptavistaraṃ tathatāṃ jānānaḥ,
K02psp_5u:1462: subhūtir āha: katamā sā bhagavaṃs tathatā?
K02psp_5u:1463: bhagavān āha: yasyās tathatāyā notpādaḥ prajñāyate, na sthitir nānyathātvaṃ prajñāyate iyaṃ sā tathatā yatra bodhisattvena mahāsattvena śikṣitavyam. evaṃ bhūtakoṭiṃ jānāno bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ sarvadharmāṇāṃ
K02psp_5u:1465: subhūtir āha: katamā sā bhagavan bhūtakoṭiḥ?
K02psp_5u:1466: bhagavān āha: akoṭir bhūtakoṭir atra koṭyāṃ śikṣamāṇo bodhisattvo
K02psp_5u:1467: mahāsattvaḥ sarvadharmāṇāṃ saṃkṣiptavistaraṃ jñāsyati, evaṃ dharmadhātuṃ jānāno bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ sarvadharmāṇāṃ saṃkṣiptavistaraṃ jñāsyati.
K02psp_5u:1469: bhagavān āha: ākāśadhātur dharmadhātur yasya dhātor na cchedaḥ prajñāyate na paricchedaḥ. evaṃ ca dharmadhātuṃ jānāno bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ
K02psp_5u:1471: subhūtir āha: kathaṃ bhagavan sarvadharmāṇāṃ saṃkṣiptavistaraṃ jñātavyam?
K02psp_5u:1472: bhagavān āha: yathā sarvadharmā na saṃyuktā na visaṃyuktāḥ.
K02psp_5u:1473: subhūtir āha: katame bhagavan sarvadharmā ye na saṃyuktā na visaṃyuktāḥ?
K02psp_5u:1474: bhagavān āha: rūpan na saṃyuktaṃ na visaṃyuktaṃ, vedanā saṃjñā saṃskārāḥ,
K02psp_5u:1475: vijñānan na saṃyuktan na visaṃyuktam, evaṃ skandhadhātvāyatanapratītyasamutpādāḥ pratītyasamutpādāṅgāni ca na saṃyuktāni na (PSP_5:106) visaṃyuktāni, evaṃ yāvat saṃskṛto dhātur asaṃskṛto dhatur na saṃyukto na visaṃyuktaḥ. tat kasya hetoḥ? na hy asyāsti svabhāvo yaḥ saṃyujyate vā visaṃyujyate vā yaś cāsvabhāvaḥ so
K02psp_5u:1476: 'bhāvo, yaś cābhāvaḥ so 'bhāvena sārdhaṃ na saṃyukto na visaṃyukta, evaṃ bodhisattvena mahāsattvena sarvadharmā jñātavyāḥ.
K02psp_5u:1477: subhūtir āha: ayaṃ punar bhagavann abhisaṃkṣepo bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasyātra hi bhagavann abhisaṃkṣepapāramitāyām ādikarmikeṇa bodhisattvena mahāsattvena śikṣitavyaṃ, yāvad daśasu bhūmiṣu
K02psp_5u:1478: sthitenehaivābhisaṃkṣepe śikṣitavyam, ihaiva punar abhisaṃkṣepe śikṣimāṇo bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ sarvadharmāṇāṃ saṃkṣepavistaraṃ jñāsyati.
K02psp_5u:1479: bhagavān āha: tīkṣṇendriyasyāpi bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasyāyaṃ praveśo,
K02psp_5u:1481: madhyendriyasyāpi bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasyāpy ayaṃ praveśaḥ, kasyacin na praveśaḥ śikṣitukāmasya bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasyāyaṃ praveśo, na khalu kuśīdasyāyaṃ praveśo na hīnavīryasya muṣitasmṛter na vikṣiptacittasyāyaṃ praveśaḥ ārabdhavīryasyākuśīdasyopasthitasmṛter ayaṃ praveśaḥ śikṣitukāmasya cāvinivartanīyabhūmau sarvākārajñatām anuprāptukāmasya cāyaṃ praveśaḥ. iti saṃkṣepavistarājñānavikalpau saced yathopadiṣṭāyāṃ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ śikṣiṣyate śikṣitvā dānapāramitāṃ śīlapāramitāṃ kṣāntipāramitāṃ vīryapāramitāṃ dhyānapāramitāṃ prajñāpāramitām anuprāpsyati, adhyātmaśūnyatāṃ bahirdhāśūnyatām adhyātmabahirdhāśūnyatāṃ yāvad abhāvasvabhāvaśūnyatāṃ
K02psp_5u:1487: sarvākārajñatām anuprāpsyati. tasya khalu punaḥ subhūte bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya prajñāpāramitāyāṃ carato yāni kānicit mārakarmāṇy
K02psp_5u:1488: utpatsyante, utpadyamānāny eva tāni prahāsyanti, tasmād upāyakauśalyaṃ parigṛhītukāmena bodhisattvena mahāsattvena prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caritavyam.
K02psp_5u:1489: yasmin samaye bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ carati prajñāpāramitāṃ bhāvayati, prajñāpāramitāyāṃ yogam āpadyate, tasmin samaye 'saṃkhyeyeṣu lokadhātuṣu ye buddhā bhagavantas tiṣṭhanti dhriyante
K02psp_5u:1490: yāpayanti dharmañ (PSP_5:107) ca deśayanti te taṃ bodhisattvaṃ mahāsattvaṃ
K02psp_5u:1491: samanvāharanti prajñāpāramitāyāṃ carantam. tat kasya hetoḥ? ato nirjātā hi
K02psp_5u:1492: subhūte 'tītānāgatapratyutpannā buddhā bhagavanto yad uta ṣaḍbhyaḥ pāramitābhyaḥ, tasmāt tarhi subhūte bodhisattvena mahāsattvena prajñāpāramitāyāṃ carataivaṃ pratikāṅkṣitavyam, aham apy enān dharmān anuprāpsyāmi ye tair atītānāgatapratyutpannair buddhair bhagavadbhir
K02psp_5u:1493: anuprāptāḥ. evaṃ khalu subhūte bodhisattvena mahāsattvena prajñāpāramitāyāṃ carataivaṃ yogam āpattavyam, evaṃ prayujyamāno bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ kṣipram anuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhim abhisaṃbhotsyate. tasmāt tarhi subhūte bodhisattvena mahāsattvena sarvākārajñatāmanasikārāvirahitena bhavitavyam. sacet punaḥ subhūte
K02psp_5u:1494: bodhisattvo mahāsattva evaṃ caran prajñāpāramitāyām antaśo
K02psp_5u:1495: 'cchaṭāsaṃghātamātrakam api prajñāpāramitāṃ bhāvayiṣyati, sa khhalu punar
K02psp_5u:1496: bodhisattvo mahāsattvo bahutarapuṇyaṃ prasaviṣyati, na tv eva ye trisāhasramahāsāhasre lokadhātau sattvās tān kaścid eva dānena saṃtarpayec
K02psp_5u:1497: chīle pratiṣṭhāpayet kṣāntau pratiṣṭhāpayed vīrye pratiṣṭhāpayet samādhau pratiṣṭhāpayet prajñāyāṃ pratiṣṭhāpayed vimuktau pratiṣṭhāpayed vimuktijñānadarśane pratiṣṭhāpayet, srotaāpattiphale pratiṣṭhāpayet sakṛdāgāmiphale pratiṣṭhāpayed anāgāmiphale pratiṣṭhāpayed arhattve pratiṣṭhāpayet pratyekabodhau pratiṣṭhāpayet. tat kasya hetoḥ? ato nirjātā hi subhūte dānaśīlakṣāntivīryasamādhiprajñāvimuktivimuktijñānadarśanāni
K02psp_5u:1499: ye 'pi te buddhā bhagavanto daśadiglokadhātuṣu tiṣṭhanti dhriyante
K02psp_5u:1500: yāpayanti, te 'pito nirjātā yad uta prajñāpāramitātaḥ. ye 'pi te subhūte '
K02psp_5u:1501: tītānāgatapratyutpannā buddhā bhagavantas te 'pīta eva prabhāvitā yad uta
K02psp_5u:1503: punar aparaṃ subhūte yo bodhisattvo mahāsattvo muhūrtaṃ vā divasaṃ vā divasaśataṃ vā saṃvatsaraṃ vā saṃvatsaraśataṃ vā kalpaṃ vā kalpaśataṃ vā yāvad asaṃkhyeyān api kalpāni māṃ prajñāpāramitāṃ sarvākārajñatāpratisaṃyuktair manasikārair bhāvayiṣyati, sa bahutaraṃ puṇyaṃ prasaviṣyati. na tv eva ye gaṅgānadīvālukāsameṣu lokadhātuṣu
K02psp_5u:1504: sattvās tān kaścid eva dānena saṃtarpayec chīle kṣāntau vīrye samādhau prajñāyāṃ vimuktau vimuktijñānadarśane ca pratiṣṭhāpayet, (PSP_5:108)
K02psp_5u:1507: pratiṣṭhāpayet. tat kasya hetoḥ? ato nirjātā hi te buddhā bhagavanto yair idaṃ dānamayaṃ puṇyakriyāvastuprajñāptaṃ, śīlamayaṃ bhāvanāmayaṃ puṇyakriyāvastuprajñāptaṃ,
K02psp_5u:1509: srotaāpattiphalaṃ sakṛdāgāmiphalam anāgāmiphalam arhattvaṃ pratyekabuddhatvaṃ prajñāptam.
K02psp_5u:1510: iti buddhaiḥ sānāthyābhāvavikalpaḥ yaḥ punar aparaṃ bodhisattvo mahāsattva evaṃ yathopadiṣṭāyāṃ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ sthitaḥ, sa khalu punar bodhisattvo mahāsattvo 'vinivartanīyaḥ pratikāṅkṣitavyaḥ. tathāgatasamanvāgataḥ sa bodhisattvo
K02psp_5u:1511: mahāsattvaḥ, upāyakauśalyena samanvāgato bahubuddhakoṭīniyutaśatasahasraparyupāsitaḥ sa bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ
K02psp_5u:1513: kalyāṇamitraparigṛhītaḥ sa bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ, ṣaṭpāramitāvatīrṇaḥ sa bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ pratikāṅkṣitavyaḥ. viṃśatiśūnyatābhāvitaḥ sa bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ, saptatriṃśad bodhipakṣyadharmabhāvitaḥ sa
K02psp_5u:1516: śūnyatānimittāpraṇihitābhijñādaśabalavaiśāradyapratisaṃvidāveṇikabuddhadharmabhāvitaḥ sa bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ, ṣaḍ abhijñāpratilabdhaḥ sa bodhisattvo
K02psp_5u:1517: mahāsattvaḥ, kumārabhūtaḥ sa bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ pratikāṅkṣitavyaḥ.
K02psp_5u:1518: abhiprāyaparipūrṇaḥ sa bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ, buddhair avirahitaḥ sa
K02psp_5u:1519: bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ, kuśalamūlair avirahitaḥ sa bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ pratikāṅkṣitavyaḥ. anākṣiptapratibhānaḥ sa bodhisattvo
K02psp_5u:1522: vyākaraṇasaṃpanno gotrasaṃpannaḥ saṃcintyabhavaḥ sa bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ pratikāṅkṣitavyaḥ. ākārapraveśakuśalo 'nakṣarapraveśakuśalo
K02psp_5u:1524: avyavahārakuśala ekādhivacanakuśalo dvyadhivacanakuśalas tryadhivacanakuśalaḥ puruṣādhivacanakuśalo rūpakuśalo, vedanākuśalaḥ saṃjñākuśalaḥ saṃskārakuśalo vijñānakuśalaḥ skandhadhātvāyatanakuśalaḥ pratītyasamutpādakuśalaḥ pratītyasamutpādāṅgakuśalo (PSP_5:109) yāvan nirvāṇakuśalo dharmadhātulakṣaṇakuśalaḥ saṃskāralakṣaṇakuśalaḥ saṃskṛtalakṣaṇakuśalo 'saṃskṛtalakṣaṇakuśalo lakṣaṇālakṣaṇakuśalo bhāvakuśalo 'bhāvakuśalaḥ svabhāvakuśalaḥ parabhāvakuśalaḥ sayogakuśalo
K02psp_5u:1526: 'vitathatākuśalo 'nanyatathatākuśalo dharmatākuśalo dharmadhātukuśalo dharmaniyāmatākuśalo dharmasthititākuśalo bhūtakoṭikuśalaḥ pratyayakuśalaḥ saṃpratyayakuśalo dhyānakuśalo 'pramāṇakuśala ārūpyasamāpattikuśalaḥ ṣaṭpāramitākuśalaś catuḥsmṛtyupasthānakuśalaḥ
K02psp_5u:1532: sarvākārajñatā manasikārakuśalaḥ. rūpaṃ rūpeṇa śūnyam iti kuśalaḥ, vedanā saṃjñā saṃskārā, vijñānaṃ vijñānena śūnyam iti kuśalaḥ,
K02psp_5u:1536: sarvapāramitāḥ sarvapāramitābhiḥ śūnyā iti kuśalaḥ, sarvaśūnyatāḥ sarvaśūnyatābhiḥ śūnyā iti kuśalaḥ, bodhipakṣyā dharmā bodhipakṣyair
K02psp_5u:1537: dharmaiḥ śūnyāḥ iti kuśalaḥ, āryasatyāny āryasatyaiḥ śūnyānīti kuśalaḥ,
K02psp_5u:1538: apramāṇadhyānārūpyasamāpattayo 'pramāṇadhyānārūpyasamāpattibhiḥ śūnyā iti kuśalaḥ, sarvavimokṣasamādhisamāpattidhāraṇīmukhāni sarvavimokṣasamādhisamāpattidhāraṇīmukhaiḥ sūnyānīti kuśalaḥ, abhijñā abhijñābhiḥ śūnyā iti kuśalo, daśabalavaiśāradyapratisaṃvido daśabalavaiśāradyapratisaṃvidbhiḥ śūnyā iti kuśalaḥ,
K02psp_5u:1540: aṣṭādaśāveṇikabuddhadharmā aṣṭādaśāveṇikair buddhadharmaiḥ śūnyā iti kuśalaḥ, anuttarā samyaksaṃbodhir anuttarayā samyaksaṃbodhyā (PSP_5:110)
K02psp_5u:1542: utpādanirodhakuśalaḥ sthityanyathātvakuśalo rāgakuśalo dveṣakuśalo mohakuśalo dṛṣṭikuśalo 'dṛṣṭikuśalo mithyādṛṣṭikuśalo 'mithyādṛṣṭikuśalo
K02psp_5u:1543: yāvat sarvadṛṣṭikuśalo nāmarūpakuśalo 'nāmarūpakuśala ārambaṇakuśala ādhipatyakuśalo hetukuśalaḥ pratyayakuśalo lakṣaṇakuśalo 'lakṣaṇakuśalo
K02psp_5u:1544: duḥkhakuśalo 'duḥkhakuśalaḥ samudayakuśalo 'samudayakuśalo nirodhakuśalo mārgakuśalo narakakuśalo narakamārgakuśalaḥ tiryagyonikuśalas tiryagyonimārgakuśalo yamalokakuśalo yamalokamārgakuśalo manuṣyakuśalo manuṣyamārgakuśalo devakuśalo devamārgakuśalaḥ srotaāpattiphalakuśalaḥ srotaāpattiphalamārgakuśalaḥ, sakṛdāgāmiphalakuśalaḥ
K02psp_5u:1555: iti prayogamārgābhāvavikalpaḥ prajñāpāramitām abhinirharataḥ. iti darśanamārgābhāvavikalpaḥ
K02psp_5u:1557: subhūtir āha: kathaṃ bhagavan prajñāpāramitāyāñ caritavyaṃ? kathaṃ
K02psp_5u:1559: bhagavān āha: rūpaśāntatayā subhūte rūpavaśikatayā rūpatucchatayā rūpāsāratayā prajñāpāramitāyāṃ
K02psp_5u:1560: vedanāsaṃjñāsaṃskāravijñānaśāntatayā vijñānavaśikatayā vijñānatucchatayā vijñānāsāratayā prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caritavyam. evaṃ skandhadhātvāyatanapratītyasamutpādasya pratītyasamutpādāṅgānāṃ śāntatayā vaśikatayā tucchatayā (PSP_5:111) asāratayā prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caritavyam.
K02psp_5u:1561: iti prayogamārgājñānavikalpaḥ yat punaḥ subhūte evaṃ vadasi, kathaṃ prajñāpāramitābhinirhartavyeti,
K02psp_5u:1563: yat punaḥ subhūte evaṃ vadasi, kathaṃ prajñāpāramitā bhāvayitavyeti,
K02psp_5u:1565: iti bhāvanāmārgajñānavikalpaḥ ity ukto navavidhaḥ prathamo grāhyavikalpaḥ
K02psp_5u:1566: subhūtir āha: kiyac ciraṃ sa bhagavan bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ
K02psp_5u:1569: iti bodhicittānutpādavikalpaḥ yāvad bodhimaṇḍam eva manasikaroty, evaṃ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caritavyam,
K02psp_5u:1571: iti bodhimaṇḍāmanasikāravikalpaḥ subhūtir āha: kiṃ punar bhagavaṃś cittāntarānām avakāśan
K02psp_5u:1573: bhagavān āha: anyeṣāṃ subhūte manasikārāṇām avakāśam adadatā prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caritavyaṃ, prajñāpāramitābhinirhartavyā, prajñāpāramitā
K02psp_5u:1575: iti śrāvakapratyekabuddhayānāmanasikāravikalpaḥ sarvākārajñatāmanasikārāvipraṇāśa eva subhūte prajñāpāramitācaryā, tathā ca caritavyā tathā cābhinirhartavyā tathā ca bhāvayitavyā, yathā cittacaitasikā dharmā na pravartate.
K02psp_5u:1576: subhūtir āha: kiṃ punar bhagavan prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caran prajñāpāramitām
K02psp_5u:1578: bhagavān āha: na subhūte. iti samyaksaṃbodher amanasikāravikalpaḥ
K02psp_5u:1579: subhūtir āha: bhāvayan punaḥ sarvākārajñatām anuprāpsyati?
K02psp_5u:1580: bhagavān āha: na subhūte. iti bhāvanāvikalpaḥ
K02psp_5u:1581: subhūtir āha: abhāvayan punaḥ sarvākārajñatām anuprāpsyati?
K02psp_5u:1582: bhagavān āha: na subhūte. ity abhāvanāvikalpaḥ (PSP_5:112)
K02psp_5u:1583: subhūtir āha: naiva bhāvayan nābhāvayan sarvākārajñatām anuprāpsyati?
K02psp_5u:1584: bhagavān āha: na subhūte. iti naivabhāvanānābhāvanāvikalpaḥ
K02psp_5u:1585: subhūtir āha: tat kathaṃ bhagavan sarvākārajñatām anuprāpsyati?
K02psp_5u:1590: bhagavān āha: yathā dharmadhātuḥ. iti yathāvikalpaḥ ity ukto navavidho dvitīyo grāhyavikalpaḥ
K02psp_5u:1592: bhagavān āha: yathātmadhātuḥ sattvadhātur jīvadhātur jantudhātuḥ poṣadhātuḥ puruṣadhātuḥ pudgaladhātuḥ.
K02psp_5u:1593: subhūtir āha: kathaṃ bhagavan tathatā bhūtakoṭidharmadhātur ātmadhātuḥ sattvadhātur jīvadhātur jantudhātuḥ poṣadhātuḥ puruṣadhātuḥ pudgaladhātuḥ?
K02psp_5u:1594: bhagavān āha: tat kiṃ manyase? subhūte api nu sa ātmā vā sattvo vā jīvo vā jantur vā poso vā puruṣo vā pudgalo vā upalabhyate.
K02psp_5u:1596: bhagavān āha: anupalabhamānaḥ subhūte ātmānaṃ vā sattvaṃ vā jīvaṃ vā jantuṃ vā poṣaṃ vā puruṣaṃ vā pudgalaṃ vā, kathaṃ sattvadhātuṃ vā yāvat pudgaladhātuṃ vā prajñāpayiṣyati. evaṃ prajñāpāramitām apy
K02psp_5u:1597: aprajñapayamānaḥ sarvadharmān apy aprajñapayamānaḥ sarvākārajñatām anuprāpsyati.
K02psp_5u:1598: subhūtir āha: kiṃ punar bhagavann aprajñapanīyā prajñāpāramitā?
K02psp_5u:1601: bhagavān āha: aprajñapanīyā subhūte prajñāpāramitā, yāvat sarvadharmāḥ saṃskṛtā vāsaṃskṛtā vā śrāvakadharmā vā pratyekabuddhadharmā vā yāvad buddhadharmā vā.
K02psp_5u:1602: subhūtir āha: yadi bhagavann aprajñapanīyāḥ sarvadharmāḥ, kutaḥ
K02psp_5u:1604: prajñāyante, yamalokā vā prajñāyante, manuṣyā vā prajñāyante, devā vā prajñāyante, srotaāpannā vā sakṛdāgāmino vānāgāmino vārhanto vā
K02psp_5u:1606: bhagavān āha: kat kiṃ manyase? subhūte 'pi nu sattvaprajñāptir upalabhyate.
K02psp_5u:1608: bhagavān āha: anupalabhamānaḥ subhūte sattvaṃ kuto nārakaṃ prajñāpayiṣyati
K02psp_5u:1609: tiryagyonigatān, yamalokaṃ vā manuṣyaṃ vā devaṃ vā srotaāpannān vā sakṛdāgāmino vā anāgāmino vā arhato vā pratyekabuddhān vā samyaksaṃbuddhān
K02psp_5u:1610: vā kutaḥ prajñāpayiṣyati? evaṃ khalu subhūte bodhisattvena mahāsattvena prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caratāprajñapanīyeṣu dharmeṣu śikṣitavyam. iti sattvaprajñāptivikalpaḥ
K02psp_5u:1611: subhūtir āha: na nu bhagavan bodhisattvena mahāsattvena prajñāpāramitāyāṃ
K02psp_5u:1612: caratā rūpe śikṣitavyaṃ, vedanāyāṃ saṃjñāyāṃ saṃskāreṣu, vijñāne
K02psp_5u:1613: śikṣitavyaṃ, skandhadhātvāyatanapratītyasamutpādeṣu pratītyasamutpādāṅgeṣu ca śikṣitavyaṃ, sarvākārajñatāyāṃ śikṣitavyaṃ, sarvapāramitāsu sarvaśūnyatāsu śikṣitavyaṃ, saptatriṃśadbodhipakṣyeṣu dharmeṣu śikṣitavyam,
K02psp_5u:1618: iti dharmaprajñāptivikalpaḥ bhagavān āha: rūpeṣu subhūte śikṣitavyam anutkṣepāprakṣepatayā, vedanāyāṃ saṃjñāyāṃ saṃskāreṣu, vijñāneṣu śikṣitavyam anutkṣepāprakṣepatayā,
K02psp_5u:1619: skandhadhātvāyatanapratītyasamutpādeṣu pratītyasamutpādāṅgeṣu ca śikṣitavyam anutkṣepāprakṣepatayā, sarvapāramitāsu sarvaśūnyatāsu śikṣitavyam anutkṣepāprakṣepatayā, saptatriṃśadbodhipakṣeṣu dharmeṣu śikṣitavyam anutkṣepāprakṣepatayā,
K02psp_5u:1624: subhūtir āha: kathaṃ bhagavan rūpe anutkṣepāprakṣepatayā śikṣitavyaṃ?
K02psp_5u:1625: vedanāyāṃ saṃjñāyāṃ saṃskāreṣu, kathaṃ bhagavan vijñāne
K02psp_5u:1628: subhūtir āha: kathaṃ bhagavan anutpādato 'nirodhataḥ śikṣitavyam?
K02psp_5u:1630: subhūtir āha: kathaṃ bhagavann anabhisaṃskāratayā śikṣitavyam?
K02psp_5u:1631: bhagavān āha: svalakṣaṇaśūnyān dharmān samanupaśyann anabhisaṃskāratayā
K02psp_5u:1633: subhūtir āha: kathaṃ bhagavan svalakṣaṇaśūnyāḥ sarvadharmā iti śikṣitavyam?
K02psp_5u:1634: bhagavān āha: rūpaṃ rūpeṇa śūnyaṃ draṣṭavyaṃ, vedanā saṃjñā saṃskārā,
K02psp_5u:1635: vijñānaṃ vijñānena śūnyaṃ draṣṭavyam, evaṃ cakṣuḥ śrotraṃ ghrāṇaṃ jihvā kāyo, mano manasā śūnyaṃ draṣṭavyam, evaṃ rūpaṃ śabdagandharasasparṣṭavyadharmāḥ śabdagandharasasparṣṭavyadharmaiḥ śūnyā
K02psp_5u:1636: draṣṭavyāḥ, cakṣurvijñānaṃ cakṣurvijñānena śūnyaṃ draṣṭavyam, evaṃ śrotraghrāṇajihvākāyamanovijñānaṃ manovijñānena śūnyaṃ draṣṭavyaṃ,
K02psp_5u:1637: cakṣuḥsaṃsparśaḥ cakṣuḥsaṃsparśena śūnyo draṣṭavyaḥ, evaṃ śrotrasaṃsparśo ghrāṇasaṃsparśo jihvāsaṃsparśaḥ kāyasaṃsparśo manaḥsaṃsparśo manaḥsaṃsparśena śūnyo draṣṭavyaḥ, cakṣuḥsaṃsparśapratyayā vedanā cakṣuḥsaṃsparśapratyayayā vedanayā śūnyā draṣṭavyā, evaṃ śrotrasaṃsparśapratyayā vedanā, ghrāṇasaṃsparśapratyayā vedanā,
K02psp_5u:1639: manaḥsaṃsparśapratyayā vedanā manaḥsaṃsparśapratyayayā vedanayā śūnyā draṣṭavyā, dānapāramitā dānapāramitayā śūnyā draṣṭavyā, evaṃ śīlapāramitā kṣāntipāramitā vīryapāramitā dhyānapāramitā, prajñāpāramitā prajñāpāramitayā śūnyā draṣṭavyā, adhyātmaśūnyatādhyātmaśūnyatayā śūnyā draṣṭavyā, bahirdhāśūnyatā bahirdhāśūnyatayā śūnyā draṣṭavyā adhyātmabahirdhāśūnyatā adhyātmabahirdhāśūnyatayā śūnyā draṣṭavyā, yāvad abhāvasvabhāvaśūnyatā abhāvasvabhāvaśūnyatayā śūnyā draṣṭavyā, āryasatyāny
K02psp_5u:1640: (PSP_5:115) āryasatyaiḥ śūnyāni draṣṭavyāni, dhyānāni dhyānaiḥ śūnyāni
K02psp_5u:1641: draṣṭavyāni, apramāṇāny apramāṇaiḥ śūnyāni draṣṭvyāni, ārūpyasamāpattaya ārūpyasamāpattibhiḥ śūnyā draṣṭavyāḥ, vimokṣamukhāni vimokṣamukhaiḥ śūnyāni draṣṭavyāni, navānupūrvavihārasamāpattayo navānupūrvavihārasamāpattibhiḥ śūnyā draṣṭavyāḥ, samādhayaḥ samādhibhiḥ śūnyā draṣṭavyāḥ, dhāraṇīmukhāni dhāraṇīmukhaiḥ śūnyāni draṣṭavyāni,
K02psp_5u:1643: smṛtyupasthānāni smṛtyupasthānaiḥ śūnyāni draṣṭavyāni, evaṃ samyakprahāṇarddhipādendriyabalabodhyaṅgāni samyakprahāṇarddhipādendriyabalabodhyaṅgaiḥ śūnyāni draṣṭavyāni, mārgā mārgaiḥ śūnyā draṣṭavyāḥ, abhijñā abhijñābhiḥ śūnyā draṣṭavyā, daśabalāni daśabalaiḥ śūnyāni draṣṭavyāni, vaiśāradyāni vaiśāradyaiḥ śūnyāni
K02psp_5u:1644: draṣṭavyāni, pratisaṃvidaḥ pratisaṃvidbhiḥ śūnyā draṣṭavyāḥ, āveṇikā buddhadharmā āveṇikaiḥ buddhadharmaiḥ śūnyā draṣṭavyāḥ, anuttarā samyaksaṃbodhir anuttarayā samyaksaṃbodhyā śūnyā draṣṭavyā. evaṃ khalu subhūte bodhisattvena mahāsattvena svalakṣaṇaśūnyeṣu dharmeṣu caritavyam.
K02psp_5u:1645: subhūtir āha: yadi bhagavan rūpaṃ rūpeṇa śūnyaṃ, vedanā saṃjñā saṃskārā,
K02psp_5u:1646: vijñānaṃ vijñānena śūnyam. evaṃ yāvad anuttarā samyaksaṃbodhir anuttarayā samyaksaṃbodhyā śūnyā. tat kathaṃ bhagavan bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya prajñāpāramitāyāṃ carir bhavati?
K02psp_5u:1647: bhagavān āha: acariḥ subhūte bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya
K02psp_5u:1649: subhūtir āha: kena kāraṇena bhagavann acariḥ?
K02psp_5u:1650: bhagavān āha: tathā hi subhūte sā prajñāpāramitā nopalabhyate, bodhisattvo
K02psp_5u:1651: 'pi nopalabhyate, carir api nopalabhyate, yo vā carito, yena vā carito,
K02psp_5u:1652: yatra vā caritas, tad api nopalabhyate. evaṃ hi subhūte acarir bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya prajñāpāramitācarir yatraite sarvaprapañcā
K02psp_5u:1654: subhūtir āha: yadi bhagavan na cariḥ prajñāpāramitācarir bhavati, tat kathaṃ bhagavann ādikarmikeṇa bodhisattvena mahāsattvena prajñāpāramitāyāṃ
K02psp_5u:1656: bhagavān āha: iha subhūte bodhisattvena mahāsattvena prathamacittotpādam upādāyānupalambheṣu sarvadharmeṣu śikṣitavyaṃ, tena dānan dadatā
K02psp_5u:1657: (PSP_5:116) anupalambhayogena dānan dātavyaṃ, śīlaṃ rakṣatā anupalambhayogena śīlaṃ rakṣitavyaṃ, kṣāntyā saṃpādayatānupalambhayogena kṣāntiḥ saṃpādayitavyā, vīryam ārabhamāṇenānupalambhayogena vīryam
K02psp_5u:1666: apramāṇadhyānārūpyasamāpattīr bhāvayatānupalambhayogenāpramāṇadhyānārūpya samāpattayo bhāvayitavyāḥ, śūnyatānimittāpraṇihitāni bhāvayatānupalambhayogena śūnyatānimittāpraṇihitāni bhāvayitavyāni,
K02psp_5u:1667: vimokṣasamādhisamāpattidhāraṇīmukhāni bhāvayatānupalambhayogena vimokṣasamādhisamāpattidhāraṇīmukhāni bhāvayitavyāni, abhijñā bhāvayatānupalambhayogenābhijñā bhāvayitavyāḥ,
K02psp_5u:1668: daśabalavaiśāradyapratisaṃvido bhāvayatānupalambhayogena daśabalavaiśāradyapratisaṃvido bhāvayitavyāḥ, āveṇikān buddhadharmān bhāvayatānupalambhayogena āveṇikā buddhadharmā bhāvayitavyāḥ,
K02psp_5u:1670: subhūtir āha: kiyatā bhagavann upalambho bhavati? kiyatā bhagavann anupalambho bhavati?
K02psp_5u:1671: bhagavān āha: yāvad dvayan tāvad upalambho, yāvad advayan tāvad
K02psp_5u:1673: subhūtir āha: kiyatā bhagavan dvayaṃ vā advayaṃ vā bhavati?
K02psp_5u:1674: bhagavān āha: yāvac cakṣurūpaṃ yāvat manodharmāś ca, yāvad bodhiś ca
K02psp_5u:1675: budddhaś ca, idaṃ subhūte dvayaṃ, yāvan na cakṣurūpaṃ, yāvan na manodharmāś ca, na bodhiś ca na buddhaś ca, idaṃ subhūte 'dvayam.
K02psp_5u:1676: iti śūnyatvavikalpaḥ subhūtir āha: kiṃ punar bhagavann upalambho 'nupalambhaḥ, athānupalambha
K02psp_5u:1678: bhagavan āha: na subhūte upalambho 'nupalambhaḥ, nāpy anupalambha upalambhaḥ, api tu khalu punaḥ subhūte upalambhānupalabdhisamatānupalambhaḥ. evaṃ khalu subhūte bodhisattvena mahāsattvenānupalambhasamatāyāṃ śikṣitavyam. evaṃ śikṣamāṇo bodhisattvo
K02psp_5u:1680: subhūtir āha: yadi bhagavan bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caran naivopalambhe sajjati nānupalambhe, kathaṃ bodhisattvena mahāsattvena prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caratā bhūmer bhūmiḥ paripūrayitavyā,
K02psp_5u:1682: bhagavān āha: na subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ carann
K02psp_5u:1683: upalambhe sthitvā bhūmer bhūmiṃ paripūrayati, na copalarabhe sthitvā
K02psp_5u:1684: śaktyā bodhisattvena mahāsattvena prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caratā bhūmer bhūmiṃ
K02psp_5u:1685: paripūrayitum. tat kasya hetoḥ? anupalambhā hi prajñāpāramitā, anupalambhā hi bodhiḥ, so 'pi nopalabhyate yaḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ carati. evaṃ khalu subhūte bodhisattvena mahāsattvena prajñāpāramitāyāñ caritavyam. iti śaktivikalpaḥ
K02psp_5u:1686: subhūtir āha: yadi bhagavan prajñāpāramitā nopalabhyate. tat kathaṃ bodhisattvena mahāsattvena prajñāpāramitāyāñ caratā dharmeṣu pravicayaḥ
K02psp_5u:1687: kartavyaḥ? idaṃ rūpaṃ, iyaṃ vedanā, iyaṃ saṃjñā, ime saṃskārā, idaṃ
K02psp_5u:1688: vijñānam, imāni skandhadhātvāyatanāni, ayaṃ pratītyasamutpāda, imāni
K02psp_5u:1689: pratītyasamutpādāṅgāni, imā pāramitāḥ, imāni śūnyatāmukhāni, ime bodhipakṣyā dharmāḥ, imā āryasatyāpramāṇadhyānārūpyasamāpattayaḥ, imāni
K02psp_5u:1691: imā abhijñā daśabalavaiśāradyapratisaṃvidaḥ, ime āveṇikā buddhadharmāḥ,
K02psp_5u:1693: bhagavān āha: iha subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caraṃs
K02psp_5u:1694: tathā dharmeṣu pravicayaṃ karoti, yathā kurvan rūpaṃ nopalabhate, vedanā saṃjñā saṃskārān, vijñānaṃ nopalabhate, skandhadhātvāyatanāni nopalabhate,
K02psp_5u:1696: pāramitā nopalabhate, śūnyatāmukhāni nopalabhate, bodhipakṣyān dharmān nopalabhate,
K02psp_5u:1701: subhūtir āha: yadi bhagavan bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ prajñāpāramitāyāñ caran rūpaṃ nopalabhate, vedanāṃ saṃjñāṃ saṃskārān, vijñānan nopalabhate,
K02psp_5u:1702: yāvad anuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhin nopalabhate. tat kathaṃ dānapāramitāṃ
K02psp_5u:1703: paripūrya śīlapāramitāṃ paripūrya kṣāntipāramitāṃ paripūrya vīryapāramitāṃ paripūrya dhyānapāramitāṃ paripūrya prajñāpāramitāṃ paripūrya bodhisattvaniyāmam avakramiṣyati, bodhisattvaniyāmam avakramya buddhakṣetraṃ pariśodhayiṣyati, buddhakṣetraṃ pariśodhya sattvān
K02psp_5u:1704: paripācayiṣyati, sattvān paripācya sarvākārajñatām anuprāpsyati sarvākārajñatām anuprāpya dharmacakraṃ pravartayiṣyati, dharmacakraṃ pravartya buddhakṛtyaṃ kariṣyati, buddhakṛtyaṃ kṛtvā sattvān saṃsārāt
K02psp_5u:1706: bhagavān āha: na subhūte bodhisattvo rūpasya kṛtena prajñāpāramitāyāṃ
K02psp_5u:1707: carati, na vedanāyā na saṃjñāyā na saṃskārāṇāṃ, na vijñānasya kṛtena
K02psp_5u:1709: pratītyasamutpādasya na pratītyasamutpādāṅgānāṃ kṛtena prajñāpāramitāyāṃ carati, na pāramitānāṃ kṛtena, na śūnyatāmukhānāṃ na bodhipakṣyānāṃ dharmāṇāṃ kṛtena,
K02psp_5u:1711: na śūnyatānimittāparanihitābhijñādaśabalavaiśāradyapratisaṃvidāveṇikabuddhadharmāṇāṃ kṛtena, nānuttarāyāḥ samyaksaṃbodheḥ kṛtena prajñāpāramitāyāṃ carati.
K02psp_5u:1712: subhūtir āha: kasyedānīṃ kṛtena bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ carati?
K02psp_5u:1713: bhagavān āha: na kasyacit kṛtena bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ
K02psp_5u:1714: carati. tat kasya hetoḥ? tathā hi subhūte 'kṛtā avikṛtā anabhisaṃskṛtāḥ sarvadharmāḥ, sāpi prajñāpāramitākṛtā avikṛtānabhisaṃskṛtā, bodhisattvo
K02psp_5u:1715: 'py akṛto 'vikṛto 'nabhisaṃskṛtaḥ. evaṃ khalu subhūte bodhisattvena mahāsattvena prajñāpāramitāyāṃ
K02psp_5u:1717: iti vastūddeśavikalpaḥ subhūtir āha: yadi bhagavann akṛtā avikṛtā anabhisaṃskṛtāḥ sarvadharmāḥ,
K02psp_5u:1718: kathaṃ yeṣāṃ bhagavaṃs trayāṇāṃ yānānāṃ vyavasthānaṃ bhavati?
K02psp_5u:1720: bhagavān āha: na subhūte 'kṛtānām avikṛtānām anabhisaṃskṛtānāṃ dharmāṇāṃ
K02psp_5u:1721: kiṃcid vyavasthānam upalabhyate, anabhisaṃskṛtānām anabhisaṃcetayitānāṃ dharmāṇāṃ vyavasthānaṃ ca nopalabhyate. tat kasya hetoḥ? tathā hi bālo
K02psp_5u:1725: pāramitāsv abhiniviṣṭaḥ, śūnyatāmukhesv abhiniviṣṭo, bodhipakṣyeṣu dharmeṣv abhiniviṣṭaḥ,
K02psp_5u:1729: sarvākārajñatāyām abhiniviṣṭo, rūpaṃ manyate rūpam upalabhate, vedanāṃ saṃjñāṃ saṃskārān, vijñānaṃ manyate vijñānam upalabhate,
K02psp_5u:1732: pratītyasamutpādāṅgāni manyate pratītyasamutpādāṅgāny upalabhate, pāramitā manyate pāramitā upalabhate, śūnyatāmukhāni manyate śūnyatāmukhāny
K02psp_5u:1733: upalabhate, bodhipakṣyān dharmān manyate bodhipakṣyān dharmān upalabhate,
K02psp_5u:1734: āryasatyāni manyate āryasatyāny upalabhate, apramāṇadhyānārūpyasamāpattīr manyate 'pramāṇadhyānārūpyasamāpattīr
K02psp_5u:1736: aṣṭavimokṣanavānupūrvavihārasamāpattīr manyate 'ṣṭavimokṣanavānupūrvavihārasamāpattīr upalabhate, samādhidhāraṇīmukhāni manyate samādhidhāraṇīmukhāny upalabhate,
